Review.Titre: Terrible ink bleeds, crooked layout... extremely poor quality product
Review.Contenu: Unfortunately, my order of 7 photo albums was a total disaster! They arrived with horrible ink bleeds throughout all 7 albums. There was NO customer service, only a chat box that made me take and submit pictures. I was later contacted by email (Rachel Goodnight), who helped send a reorder. However, the SECOND reorder had problems with pages printed out of alignment. I contacted Rachel and she sent a THIRD order out which just arrived. That reorder was good... finally. I would say you need to find another printer contractor because the one you have is absolutely terrible. Although Rachel was helpful, this whole ordeal has been extremely distressful and frustrating as these albums are Christmas gifts and I spent MANY LONG HOURS creating the layout. Consequently and regrettably, I will NOT use this service again, NOR will I ever recommend anyone use it. It was just too horrible of an experience.

Review.Titre: Received a calendar I did not order, and was charged for it.
Review.Contenu: Several days after I received a calendar I ordered I received a second, which I did not order. Motif refused to take responsibility, saying they would not have sent me the calendar if I hadn't ordered it. The date they "claim" I ordered the second calendar, I was not even home.Update: Motif kindly offered to refund my money for the calendar and also offered a discount code for a future purchase.

Review.Titre: It was not possible to upload the…
Review.Contenu: It was not possible to upload the project, also issues with credit card info. Internet connection was excellent, we up/downloaded even bigger data packages around the several trials to order the photo book. Something in the Mimeo App seems to be wrong.
Blurry pictures, very slow customer service. Issue not resolved. Blurry reprint. Partial refund and a blurry calendar doesn’t scream great service at all. Shame!

Review.Titre: I’ve used the service for several years…
Review.Contenu: I’ve used the service for several years under motif. Last year after several orders, they sent me a email saying because I was a good customer we are giving you a discount on your next order, no time limit. Do you really think I would just order more calendars for no reason because of a timed discount?  And the price just keeps going up,  the shipping doubled. I will find another company to do business with, so far I haven’t received any customer service from this one.
Unfortunately quality get down. The put a logo on the product while they raised the price by 40%. Will stop with this.

Review.Titre: Cheap looking with a big price tag
Review.Contenu: I ordered a hard cover book from Motif and it was nice not exceptional. So I thought I'll print a smaller soft cover book thinking it would be decent print. It was awful, the photos were dark and print quality wasn't there, maybe because of the size. I wound't recommend printing a smaller book (15x20). It cost so much and the quality does not measure to the price.  I paid 35 euros (thats with a 25% discount) so I would've paid a lot more for a very cheap product.

Review.Titre: I ordered 12 photo books for my family
Review.Contenu: I ordered 12 photo books for my family. I mailed 6 and hand delivered the remaining 6! I gave one to my sister at Thanksgiving. The cover was from my project but the inside was another family. We laughed but I was irritated because although it was just 1 of 6 that I handed out was an error.  I worried about the other 6 I mailed. Just a pain to have to deal with contacting the company and getting replacement books!

Review.Titre: Used to be way better. So disappointed
Review.Contenu: I ordered books though Apple since 2011. When it became available as a downloadable app (Motif) I kept ordering. The look and layout options decreased in my opinion but I ordered because on the shelve they all had the same height and look. Now I ordered a book and received one from mimeo. The book cover is in bad condition (dirty and wrinkles). It is a Christmas present and honestly looks aweful compared to what the booked used to be. Also all the photo pages feel different in the hand, the colors don't shine as they used to and there is a strange dull pattern on every single page. You see it as soon as sun or light shines on it. I loved these photo books but am honestly shocked what they are now.The service (chat) is slow and the answers are translated because they kept asking for things I already mentioned and the grammar, as well as sayings (like you're welcome) were wrong. The prices (also for shipping increase) but the quality does not.

Review.Titre: The price is really out overof sight
Review.Contenu: The price is really out of sightI bought 2 calendars a few weeks agoShipping was $7.99Last week I ordered 2 moreThe shipping was now $11.99I have a few more calendars to orderI can’t imagine what the shipping will cast me by thenI’m up to $40 a calendar nowProbably will not order next year The cost is getting rediculous.

Not only did the book not arrive on time, UPS made it clear that Motif printed a shipping label, but never actually shipped my order. I wish I could leave negative stars: they've never shipped my book, and now--a week after it should have been delivered--their bots are soliciting my favorable review. Yeah, that's not happening.

Card never arrived. Was almost immediately lost in transit. Contacted customer service several times, was basically just told to wait, that it should show up soon (though there was conspicuous absence of tracking data). Requested several times that a new card be sent via priority mail. Didn't happen. Total fail on all levels. Will not use again.

Review.Titre: I am trying to re-purchase an order…
Review.Contenu: I am trying to re-purchase an order from my phone and it’s impossible. The chat person’s instructions don’t work, which he acknowledged and then told me to go to my computer, which I can’t do.  I am trying to give you my money. Ridiculous.

5ER3Q56Q74-BWe were out of the house when UPS arrived, on 12 July, 2023. If the package was too large to go through the letter box, it was not left with a neighbour and no card was delivered to let is know where to collect. Its whereabouts is a mystery. Your colleague Rodney has very kindly arranged for a replacement order, with the new order number given above. It was six copies of my son's pre-wedding celebrations at The Crystal Maze, Manchester. We hope it will be successfully delivered.Best wishes,Dr. John McCue

Review.Titre: 3 wedding albums all with printing mistakes
Review.Contenu: We designed and ordered our wedding album via Motif. After spending a very long time on the design the first album arrived with streaks in various pictures. They sent another one immediately but there sadly the writing was smudged. They sent a third but the writing was still smudged. If it weren’t for the very responsive customer service I would give 0 stars. It is very sad that for such a high price we did not receive one error fee album.

Review.Titre: Pages fall out after light use
Review.Contenu: Pages fall out of infrequently and gently used books after one year. Company’s response: all books fall apart, even just sitting on shelf after one year.What?!?Offered 25% off replacement. We have ordered many books for ourselves and family. Never again.Follow up - clearly a robotic reply from Motif.  My name is not Jennifer and - if my reply was read buy a human, they would see - I contacted Motif and was told pages falling out of books - all books - is to be expected within one year.  Truly awful product and customer service.Update - Motif responses on Trustpilot are much more polite and solicitous than actual customer service from company, which is abrupt and rude.

The project was super easy to create and I was very happy with the finished project. Unfortunately, there were problems when ordering with the upload of the file. Despite the super helpful people in customer service, we were unable to determine the issue and it was referred to the technical service team. That was three days ago and still no answers so I suspect it’s time to return to the photo book creator I was using previously.

Review.Titre: I have created dozens of books and…
Review.Contenu: I have created dozens of books and calendars over the years with Motif and have always been satisfied.  This time the delivered product was totally unexceptional. Very disappointing. Your service team is working very hard to correct the problem and to find a solution.

Rubbish!Every year I order with them as it is the only present that my parents want. Every year there is an issue with delivery and I end up spending the week before Christmas trying to resolve. This year again, like Groundhog Day, here I am again…I ordered nearly one month ago now and both orders never arrived No customer service number or chat in a world where both are completely normal for a functioning service

I´m not happy at all with delivering, I paid shipping cost  and I realized that my packet was in a UPS point located in a Tobacco Store. First of all it was a present and should be delivered in the adress I wrote, and second, why do I have to go to a Tobacco Store ???

Appalling. The album turned up with half the pages completely blank and with no resemblance to what was on the screen. I found myself receiving unhelpful emails from a robot and no-one has been able to help me resolve the issue. Motif have of course banked the payments

It’s going to be a month and I’m waiting for the order to arrive. It’s a Christmas gift that may not be presented in due. Based on the shipping track system, the item is going back and forth between two mail centers. Things happen so I’ve tried to reach out to motifphotos several times.  I am yet to receive any response.

I received my photo boom with 1/2 the photos missing. I uploaded and organized 100 pages of photos. What I received was a 100 page book, with 60 pages printed and 40 pages blank. I emailed customer care on November 10th. I received a reply to send them photos of the issue, which I did, but since then I’ve emailed customer care twice more and have not received any reply or resolution.

Review.Titre: I have to review my review …
Review.Contenu: I have to review my review from last time. I did not receive my photo book from motif, nor did I see any money from them in my account as they promised. In the meantime I got two photo books from a different company, created after the one I did with motif and I paid less for them. Sorry to say, but motif is not for me...

Apparently, my order was lost in shipping. Instead of promptly reprocessing and sending it out, it took over a week and a half to expedite it. I finally received my order on 8/30. Customer service attempted and finally did rectify the problem thanks to Mohammed.Having a phone number for customer service would improve customer satisfaction "immensely."

My wife loves your books!!!Her last order of 3 books was duplicated and she was charged twice.  Her credit card was charged twice $ 322.36.  This is a terrible problem!!!  We called her Marriott card to challenge the second charge.  We haven’t heard anything from you or our credit card company.Can you help???  My wife is a very good customer of yours for many years.Please help!!!  Joan Palleschi.  1-248-363-0654

You printed my book incorrectly. I requested a reprint and the same book was sent with pixelated pictures which was not how the pictures were on the program. I want the book printed CORRECTLY AT NO COST TO ME

Review.Titre: The actual construction of a project is…
Review.Contenu: The actual construction of a project is smooth and trouble free but trying to checkout I found impossible. In spite of advice from customer services nothing would upload without error. A very frustrating experience.
Order never arrived. Shipper said there was a problem and Motif was notified. Still no word from Motif on a replacement after five days.

Review.Titre: Non EU company - delays because of Brexit.
Review.Contenu: Because this company is based in Britain, the delivery was so late, I have been unable to view the result. Next time I will use a company based in the EU.

Trustpilot DID NOT allow me to enter an email address.  I will try the address you sent as an alternate.  I am using my original review to respond to Motif.  They requested my information but gave me no direction in where to send it.  My contact info is XXX.. Hope to hear from them. And now I can't send my email info through Trustpilot (which is good).  So...Motif please respond as to the method for contacting YOU!  Motif has been my go to photo book for years. Learned through Apple Books.  My results were amazing!  That is until this week.  While using the program after 50 pages the software froze causing me to do a forced shut down.  When I rebooted my entire project with the exception of the cover page disappeared!  So I started from the beginning - this time same thing happened at page 116 (using the new 120 page format).  Sadly this was a gift for my husband in honor of our 30th wedding anniversary.  Now I have nothing to show for hours and hours of work.  I contacted support (was told they were for Mimeo) - they sent me an app to clean up the Motif app.  Quite frankly I am not tech savvy enough to use it (76 years old).  I literally sat in my chair and cried.  So frustrated.  What to do?  Will contact Apple to discuss the App cleaner but will more than likely look for a new company!  So disappointed and frustrated. Beware if you use the Motif program!!

Review.Titre: UPS still did not deliver my order
Review.Contenu: UPS still did not deliver my order, they are real amateurs! Already waiting for 8 days!

Review.Titre: The experience of making this book was…
Review.Contenu: The experience of making this book was easy and fun.   Getting the book to me is the difficult part.   I was told 2 weeks .... then I was told a month ....  and now I'm being told it's going to take 2 months to get to me.
I never received my albumorder: D96JQ7LE7KPlease do something for me
The pictures, taken in daylight, with a great camera, looks like iphone pictures in the dark...
Paid for express 3-4 day delivery service and still not received album 2 weeks later...!

Awful. The book was beautiful but I had an issue after I received it, tried to reach customer service and it has been impossible to get anyone to respond. The help line is a joke. All you get is a message telling you everyone is busy please email Motif. Then when you email you get a form letter that assures you someone will get back to you but then NO ONE EVER DOES. IT'S MADDENING and very unfortunate because I was pleased with the interface for designing and ordering but heaven forbid you have an issue or a question. Good luck with that.

Review.Titre: I tried to contact for information…
Review.Contenu: I tried to contact for information verifying which photo was the actual finished product representation, the one with the orange guide lines showing where the photo is folded over the sides or the preview, because the borders are different.  Makes a difference!  So, first photo was crap.  No-one answered my question and that is just awful customer service.  You need to make available a phone number so we can speak to humans about questions/concerns.

Despite contacting customer care my album has still not arrived so therefore I cannot give a review on the quality of this product. All I know is As this was supposed to have been a birthday gift we went to Costco and received an album in 3 days great quality and will use them next time.

Review.Titre: The Quality ist not so god as bei Apple…
Review.Contenu: The Quality ist not so god as bei Apple before

Unfortunately, the soft cover photo album was falling apart when I got it. While customer service did accommodate a replacement after I sent photos of how badly it was assembled, they didn’t allow for any flexibility when I asked to pay to change from soft to hard cover to avoid the same quality issues again. I was very disappointed in the quality. Try the hard cover if you do order from here.
DISASTER!!  After spending several hours developing a book, the program quiet and won't reopen.  Hours wasted.  Motif needs to get its act together.

I placed an order with motif app with expedite shipping, this was a gift of photo memories for my Daughter. On the promised day of delivery, they send me an email canceling the order without any reason. They took my money. What a disappointment. Please be aware. What happened to me can happened to anyone.I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS SITE/COMPANY TO ANYONE..

Review.Titre: Book arrived late despite ordering by deadline
Review.Contenu: Motif’s marketing and website said many times over to order by May 2 with expedited shipping to receive by Mother’s Day. I ordered on April 28 (and paid $25 for expidited shipping instead of free shipping) and the book arrived late. Further, contacting customer support did nothing and they are no longer replying.

HORRIBLE customer service! I ordered a photo book and it came missing half of the photos that I put in. Customer service was no help, they tried giving me three different coupon codes none of them worked. Then they said it would get a refund within 5-12 business days and it’s been over a month. I try calling and no one picks up the phone. I’m still trying to get my money back, don’t buy from here!

I downloaded the app, chose a book style and downloaded photos. I'm having problems editing so I tried to contact customer service. A page comes up "contact us " but when you try to select it nothing happens. There is no phone number or way to contact customer service.

Motif is a total disappointment!!!  Getting  a response from their customer service department is nonexistent!!!!  I’ve emailed them three time with NO response back!!  I ordered one photo book and they have my credit card charged TWICE for the same order!!  NEVER again will i use their service!!  I give them one star only because there is nothing less!!!

Received my order of a 80 photo soft cover book.My wife opened it up for Mother’s Day and on the first page turn the book fell apart and most of the pages ripped apart. Called customer service, the sent me another book. Clearly no quality control was done . Emailed customer service because they do not have a phone number which is annoying. They re-printed my book. Received the re-printed book about a week later open it up and the same issue again. Currently waiting on the 3rd Iteration of the next fix they send me. Needless to say I will not be purchasing from them in the future

I have used Motif in the past, but this time though I ordered a photo book weeks ago, I cannot get a response from this pathetic company. I have pleaded four times for an update and get "in progress." and no reply to my emails though they say they will reply This is a photo book for my little granddaughter and it's time sensitive since I am terminally ill. Motif seems to have just disappeared Shameful,

I have happily and successfully used Motif photo books in the past. However, my most recent experience with two books resulted in a problem at checkout. I get an error message that is unknown to me and unknown to translate. I have contacted Motif using the Customer service section of the website on two occasions this week and have yet to hear back. To say I am frustrated is an understatement. I have spent countless hours producing two lovely books that I want to check out and have printed - please contact me to help me resolve this technical issue.Thank you.

Although previous experiences have been uncomplicated this most recent purchase experience was laughable.  The original calendar purcase never made it to my door which required a cancellation and re-order.  The re-order has been delayed nearly 1 month...now nearing February on a calendar that was intended to be a Christmas gift for my Grandmother who in her own words has stated is the only gift she looks forward to...unfortunately, she has since passed.

Review.Titre: I placed my order almost 3 weeks ago…
Review.Contenu: I placed my order almost 3 weeks ago and paid for expedited shipping. I still have received no updates and my order just says “In progress.” I have reached out to customer service multiple times and have received no additional information. I cannot believe how terrible their customer service is and highly recommend taking your business elsewhere.

Motif software crashes. If you want to create a photo book set expectations to create the same book 2-4 times before you get to print it. I've lost my photo book project 3 times now. I had nearly 68 pages completed of 10-18 photos per page. The program simply reverts back to page 10 for no reason. Heartbreaker.

Review.Titre: Total waste of time and money
Review.Contenu: Total waste of time and money, still waiting for order keeps being put back on a daily basis now four delays by this company and UPS.Dont use
Horrible product. Functionality on iPad is poor. Almost impossible to arrange the book and delete photos. Will not be using this again ever.
No support for OCONUS addresses.

Still haven't received my package. I can't blame the post-office, because Amazon uses them too. When they say my package will be delivered, it is. I was notified via your tracking, my package would be delivered TEN days ago. "Still waiting... I-I-I'm STILL waiting..." Talking Heads' "Crosseyed & Painless"

I was so dissatisfied with the album and the pictures that I ordered another album from a different source. I didn’t know what else to do. I was very happy with the other album that I ordered. Now I’m stuck with an album that I can’t do anything with. I wish I could send it back and get a refund. Joseph LeBlanc

Review.Titre: Horrible customer service, still haven't received my books
Review.Contenu: I have ordered two photo books that were supposed to come before Dec 29th.  It's Jan 6th and they haven't arrived, I have written three emails to the company over the past week and haven't received any emails back other than the standard we have received your email and will get back to you.  When I call I get disconnected after hearing a message that "sorry we cannot connect your call at this time, please call back at a later time".  Horrible company.  I have spent $300 for nothing so far and will be contacting Visa to get a refund soon.

The book I created was to celebrate the life of a 90 year old person through gathered photos. The layout of the book I received was not the one I sent off. Some photos were dropped, others were repeated several times, and there were odd configurations on some pages that did not fit the photo at all; e.g. a long narrow landscape view of a portrait cut or off people's heads cut off. I know what I sent off because I double checked it several times to be sure I had everything laid out correctly, and used a hand-written check-list to be sure everything was included the way I intended. When I went to check with my Motif account to see if this was somehow my error, the project didn't even show up as ever having been completed, despite having actually received the book!  I reprinted everything as single photos and put them in a photo album myself.  Arrrrg. Won't use this product again!

Completely botched my order, trimming about one-half inch off the top full-bleed pages and cutting off heads in the process. This AFTER dealing with buggy warning messages that their customer service people seemed incapable of understanding or helping me resolve. Their approach seems to be, 1) skim customer question, 2) find boilerplate "answer" to unrelated question, 3) append the nonresponsive answer to reply plus some canned pleasantries, 4) when customer complains, see 1). Just awful company.

Review.Titre: My book came back with several repeated…
Review.Contenu: My book came back with several repeated pages with the same pictures, I Reached out to customer service to let them know and their response to me was it was my error and that was it I’m not sure whether to put it on my coffee table as a joke or to throw it out I was very disappointed that there was no offer to fix the book

Motif delivery service let’s them down. Photo books are late and their tracking system is useless. Was told a delivery would be made on 19th Jan within a 2 hour slot, nothing arrived ( again ) and now I have a mew date of 26th. Blaming Covid & Brexit. They give you a delivery date knowing they cannot meet that date. Best stick to a UK company. First order I gave them the benefit of the doubt but second order was just as bad.

This is a review of Motif's extension for the macOS Photos app used to create projects within macOS Photos and send to Motif for printing.As soon as a project is created a pop-up apears asking you to sign up for their news letter. I really hate news letter pop-ups proliferating the web.It's not a good extension, page layout is fixed, like it or not.My photos have lots of meta data (description etc.) yet the extension does not allow any of this to be used in the photo book.Not a good extension.

Review.Titre: Disappointed that have to order such…
Review.Contenu: Disappointed that have to order such large numbers of photos.  You jump from 10 to 25 --- that is horrible.  To order 11 photos I have to order 10 and pay your shipping and handling rate.  Then I have to order 1 photo and pay the same high shipping and handling again!   Should be able to order some other quantity instead of having to jump and order 15 photos I do not need.  Way you have it set up it becomes so expensive and unfair! .

Review.Titre: There is no effective customer support
Review.Contenu: There is no effective customer support. When you call the contact number the person that answers has no knowledge whatsoever. The first time I called and explained my issue, and was promised someone from tech would contact me - no one did. Months later, the second time I called and explained my problem, I got an email with a form response that was totally useless. You need improved customer support.

Problems with order:1. Did not arrive on date promised. Paid for expatiated shipping.  Was credited after I sent two emails. 2.  Arrived with 12 blank pages but was charged for 22. Missing half my photos.  3. Do you not proofread before shipping books?

Review.Titre: Great Idea...Poor Customer Service and Follow-Up
Review.Contenu: Great Idea, very poor customer service.  No way to get through on a phone call and 1-3 days for a response on email.  This effectively shuts me down on my project until i hear from you, and, often the question is not answered because I am unable to have a quick follow-up question.  You have multiple user errors on your site that could be easily fixed if someone would just listen to the customer.

Review.Titre: honestly this should be easier at this…
Review.Contenu: honestly this should be easier at this point- I've been doing these books monthly for like 12 years and these books are so hard still...  Wish they were more intuitive and a real person could give it a once over to make sure there aren't huge issues...  also why do so many of my photos have orange elcamation points?  sorry but I do wish they were easier!

Review.Titre: I am having the exact same problem as…
Review.Contenu: I am having the exact same problem as A. Sakowitz below.  It is extremely frustrating and I have tried 3 times to create book, but its impossible to get the program to load all photos (it says its loading, for example, 380 high resolution photos, but then the photo bin only shows 320 photos available.  And then when I do use the photos in the bin photos will disappear the next time I open the book.

Review.Titre: If I could give no stars
Review.Contenu: If I could give no stars - I would. This was advertised as a way to print projects ( photo books, etc) to take the place of Apple’s printing programs.  I have been working for HOURS on three projects.  I finished one and went to save it as a PDF.  There is NO option to do so.  Therefore you are restricted to printing ONLY through Motif.  Had I known this I would never have downloaded this program.

Review.Titre: I ordered Christmas cards and 4 of them…
Review.Contenu: I ordered Christmas cards and 4 of them were non-usable with scratches when I received them. I complained and the only compensation they would offer me was 4 new copies of my Christmas cards which they would send me by post...According to Motif Photos they sent the new cards over a week ago, and they should be here by now... I had to contact them again to get my tracking number and according to UPS there is no delivery address for this tracking :-( I will not be ordering from Motif Photos again...

Review.Titre: Although the book finally got printed…
Review.Contenu: Although the book finally got printed it took 5 tries to get to where it could be submitted. And no matter what was emailed me to correct the problem it was never resolved.  I do have a printed book but nothing was ever saved to my computer. The only way I was ever able to get to the finish was not to leave the website.  Not being able to speak to someone at the company is horrible. Very poor service

I read the instructions. However the text box NEVER worked as they said it should. Thee is one page with a picture left off. So one picture on half a page. Top of page blank. No explanation for this. Picture quality is unsatisfactory. I paid about $85. Frankly, I have had better luck at Walgreens. Will not use this again. My first grandchild. Was expecting excellent photo book.

Crashed every 15 seconds for months. Lost work. Projects that used to take me 2 months in my spare time (photo book) took my 8 months. I dreaded opening the software. In fact, I do not know where some of my photos are now, because after I added them to Motif, it appears they are gone from my Apple Photos app library.  But... I was forced to keep going and endure crashes because Apple doesn't really have a better plugin.

Unfortunately, despite paying extra for shipping and despite being guaranteed delivery before Christmas, my mother’s Christmas present was delivered on the 26th - after she had left. The other two books were nice, and I’m sure my mom’s is too, but the emotional value of the gift is ruined. Also - when I contacted motif customer service they were unhelpful in the extreme. Motif is good when it’s good- but horrible when they fail. Use another service.

I WISH I could leave a good review but I can’t. I reached out to the customer service via email FOUR times over two weeks and got a response twice neither times fixing my issue. They actually asked me what the problem was AFTER I already explained it & then never answereMy last two emails were never answered. I’m huge on customer service so for this reason I’d NEVER recommend them to anyone. Save yourself the headache. Still waiting for my 25% off -_-

Review.Titre: I cannot give you more than one star…
Review.Contenu: I cannot give you more than one star right now.  I have appreciated the written responses to my challenges and I have tried to follow the instructions to create a book without the blacked out photos with no success.  Frankly, I'm tired of trying and have requested a refund or credit on a new book with no success.  I have a made several successful Apple and Shutterfly books in the past.  I regret Apple is no longer providing this service and has decided to outsource to Motif.
Our photo books were bent and damaged when we received them and the photo quality is terrible. Will never order from here again.

Review.Titre: very difficult to use and learn after…
Review.Contenu: very difficult to use and learn after using apple's program to make books..I had no real help by telephone , only email. I learned it myself by trial and error from what info Motif sent. I would have preferred someone walking me thru, especially since this was my 1st time using Motif. I won't use them again because of lack of help and choices. I was not impressed. My book came out "Okay"..but it was not exactly what I expected.

I ordered a calendar in January 2020 and it came with 2019 dates. I couldn’t figure it out.  Online I couldn’t even find 2019 as an option. Motif didn’t apologize. After 10 or more emails back and forth I called it quits. I reordered the calendar so it was correct.  So I got one calendar for the price of two. Lucky me. Paying double.

Review.Titre: I am VERY unhappy.because I have not…
Review.Contenu: I am VERY unhappy.because I have not received my book, nor will UPS/USPS tell me when I will receive it.  I had a reunion party of the people on our trip last nite and was hoping to share it.  Between the trouble I had with the text in the book, and the fact that nearly two weeks after I ordered it, I can’t even find out when I’ll receive it,  I doubt that I will ever use Motif again.  I would give Motif one star.  Very, very disappointing!!Kathy Wright

Review.Titre: I submitted a book for printing
Review.Contenu: I submitted a book for printing, along with a pdf version. Right away, I noticed that the pdf had a couple of corrupted images.I resubmitted my order, being extra careful to preview the uploaded version. It looked fine. But then, the pdf has a corrupted image (a different one than the first time). Now I am worried that the hard copy book I am sending as a gift will have a corrupted image.My main complaint is frustration, I don’t know how to get a good printed book.

The program quits unexpectedly and doesn't actually save the work done. I miss Apple photo. The designs also suck. Apple's designs were much sleeker, polished, and required less work. Motif you have to change EVERYTHING from the page color to the text color, font, etc. The text box option is clunky, doesn't move or work easily.

Review.Titre: I ordered a simple folding card
Review.Contenu: I ordered a simple folding card. I was charged $15 shipping and then I heard nothing, no status change on my order for a week. When I contacted Motif for a second time I got an email back saying they had been emailing me. They said I must not have been receiving the emails...yet I received that one. I placed the order on January 27th (which Motif modified to February 5th) for my Uncle's birthday on February 9th...it's February 17th 2020 and he still has not received the card.

Review.Titre: I ordered my first book on Motif
Review.Contenu: I ordered my first book on Motif, because Apple discontinued their photos service.  When the book arrived many pages were blank and the total project was missing about 15-20 photos.  Their customer service is terrible.  They reply with a general answer about my situation.  I have been back and forth about 3 times through email and the answer never changes? I have now asked for a refund and have yet to hear from them!  Very Frustrated and disappointed.

I ordered the shipment expedited. When it hadn’t even shipped after 4 days after I ordered it, I called and Motif said that they would upgrade it to 2 day. It still did not arrive for another 4 days. I tried to call Motif but the answering service did not work so I emailed them asking for a refund. I still have not received anything. Motif has the worst “customer service”. I wouldn’t even call you customer service since nothing has been done. There has been no service whatsoever.

Review.Titre: I had high hopes with Motif
Review.Contenu: I had high hopes with Motif, but after receiving my photo book half my photos were missing from the pages.  Their customer care team has looked into it, but they couldn't get it corrected on their end.  I don't understand how half my photos were able to get uploaded to my project at Motif and the others did not.  They all came from the same cameras, computer and cloud.  A lot of work went into putting the photo book together with extra pages, to be let down when it arrived.

Review.Titre: ordering and check out is abysmal
Review.Contenu: The only reason I use Motif is because I can recreate some Apple photobooks I had made in the past. I have just now tried to check out for the fourth time with no success.  This time I got to the very last step and was eventually told it timed out.  This has happened all but one time I used Motif.

the photo album i ordered had more than half of the photos appearing extremely dark, much more so that the original photos. The quality of the album itself was great except for the that issue. Customer service is very spotty and still have not replied to my latest email which I sent two days ago

Delivery not on timeI was supposed to receive a simple calendar by UPS by 29Dec2020 and it has never arrived. Despite several messages to the customer support, no-one is answering - They are easy to collect your money but they are less efficient to track their shipment.

Unfortunately my conversion from iPhoto to motif did not go so well, the pictures were badly pixilated.  But, the company was very good about giving me a refund.  I just wish I had known apple was stopping their phonebook service earlier and then I wouldn't have had to do the conversion.

Review.Titre: I ordered my Motif book in early…
Review.Contenu: I ordered my Motif book in early October.  I live in Alaska.  I have a UPS tracking numbe.  That number indicates that my book was placed in the USPS MAIL by UPS on October 21.  I have not received the book nor can I track it any longer since since UPS does not have a USPS tracking number to give to me.  It is October 31 and I have no idea how to find out where my book is!!!!!!  IF Motif says they use UPS, it should not try to cut corners.  I do get UPS delivered packages regularly at my home address in Alaska.

does a lousy job of making photo books, The pages were not close enough to the back of the book so it was difficult to open without damaging the pages.  some of the pages were trimmed so a little bit of the next page was showing at the edge of the next page,  I had 3 books made and not happy with any of them,  I had ordered the 8x8 hard copy with 20 pages. found latter that I could get an 8x10 hard book with 30 pages with COSTCO for $25.  I use to be very happy with the quality of books done on iPhoto.  These are a big disappointment.

Very difficult to use.  Read instructions & could not make the steps work.  Did not accurately reflect which pictures were put in book; sometimes could edit and sometimes not; I worked on this one book over & over again because it was so frustrating.  Putting text in too complicated so deleted what little I had - & two words showed up (too big & on wrong page) once printed.  Had used iPhoto for years - very disappointed with switch to Motif.  Will try another program & not use Motif again.  Twice the price for same size book & number of pages.

Your instructions were opaque to nonexistent.  We felt our way thru the process with scant guidance from you.  I'll give you an F for user friendly.  The final product was ok, though the first thing I thought of when the book arrived the angst that went into creating it.  C for the product.

Product is good. Shipping methods are terrible. Packages arrive busted open in transit. One order for 10 cards arrived with 5 envelopes. E-mail confirmation of shipping is hit or miss.Customer service is slow...off shore? I doubt I'll ever use Motif again. Look elsewhere. I am.

Review.Titre: I ordered 5 copies of a picture book
Review.Contenu: I ordered 5 copies of a picture book, unfortunately several images did not print. I sent an email last week referring to this matter and received a reply from Nitesh at customer care with a request to illustrate the defect. I  subsequently sent the documentation on January 12 picturing the missing images on the respective pages. Thus far I have not heard from Motif at all.I've never had a problem in previous years and just not sure how this could have happened.I hope be able to sent out these new and complete books to my clients very soon.Kind regards,Bayot

Review.Titre: I used to be able to buy as many cards…
Review.Contenu: I used to be able to buy as many cards as I needed.  Your change to jump the amount from 10 up to 2 is ridiculous!!  To order 15 cards that I might need I have to order 10 with shipping charges and then do another order for  with shipping charges!  You say that this makes preparation of orders better for you .... but it does not!  You are preparing the same number of cards but getting more money to send them.  This is unfair and not good for those of us who need to order smaller amounts of cards that do not fit into amounts of 25 then 50 then 5 then 100!!!  Hate this.

Review.Titre: User unfriendlyThe quality of the images is good
Review.Contenu: The quality of the images is good, but the program is very user unfriendly. First there is no format for holiday cards; you must take a birthday format card and co-opt it into a holiday format. Next formatting and cropping photos is difficult, much more difficult than using the old Apple Photos program. Finally writing a year end summary is difficult. The program does not like mixing images and words. This is the third time I have used Motif and since it has not improved with age, I will be using a different provider next year.

I found the software to be a pretty big disappointment. It was buggy- the right side of the screen would continuously get cut off, not well thought out- you can’t move photos from one month to the next in the global view? Really? and quite a resource hog- after awhile it would start to bog down and the fans would kick into high-speed. We’re not exactly rendering 4K video here… Once the calendar was done I found the ordering/registration process to be messy at best and as a result missed a sizable discount offer that couldn’t be applied retroactively. A discount that would have been nice to offset the surprisingly steep shipping costs. The calendar itself is fine, it’s of a decent quality and it looks nice, its just a shame the rest of the experience was so unpolished.

Review.Titre: I created and sent 2 almost identical…
Review.Contenu: I created and sent 2 almost identical books on the same date and my recipients got each other’s books. It was highly embarrassing and logistically difficult to right that wrong on my own. Not happy.

Review.Titre: Because I can’t keep book on my iPhotos because Apple stop using their program it took me 4 years to redo what I had akready done just had to hit by and my granddaughter had to wait 4 yrs to figure da
Review.Contenu: I already texted that where did d it go? It went to title . Read it below if you can even get it now! Wrote 2 paragraphs about upset I can’t even look at the photo book so can do third granddaughters because you don’t have it stored there n my iPhoto’s like they did. Hate this!!!

Review.Titre: Disappointing experience. Will not be ordering again.
Review.Contenu: I have been ordering two calendars from this company every Christmas for a minimum of the last 8 years. I was extremely disappointed this year at the lack of coupons, shipping cost and the inability to send both  calendars in the same package. Shipping for one paper calendar was $15. And there was no way to add both calendars to my cart so that the total cost of shipping would be $15. I paid $30 to send two calendars to my home. I complained to the company about this, and they said that there was nothing they could do. Very disappointing I will not be ordering from them again.

Review.Titre: Black smudges on all sides of photo cards
Review.Contenu: Project arrived fairly quickly however…. There are non removable black marks and smudges on every photo card, either on the inside pages or the backside!

Review.Titre: There is no possibility to create a…
Review.Contenu: There is no possibility to create a ptf-file from the created personal calendar. It is also not possible to transfer the new calendar 2024 to other person, or to show it in digital version.regardsDieter

Review.Titre: Overall a difficult process with pitfalls
Review.Contenu: Making this book was laborious and time consuming. - For starters, there's no high image per page template available. So we couldn't just click and fill and be done with it, instead we had to edit each page (100 pages!!)- Reflowing the images feature can easily destroy your whole book, and there's no version revert functionality. So if you mess up, you have to start again. Made the experience anxiety producing. - We made the mistake of removing duplicate images from our Apple photo library only to find that half the images must have been in the book. They simply disappeared leaving a blank space and no clue as to which images they were. - can't reorder the photos by created date. 99% of books we make are chronological!- Glitchy checkout! It kept failing to create the book, or got stuck in a checkout step.Promo codes: there's a promo code on Motif's Instagram with no expiry date, but doesn't work because? (sure it's for Valentines day, but take it down!). Motif also doesn't reply to questions on Insta.Promo codes also have to be entered with no character spaces before or after them. How hard would that be for a developer to code out? Not the experience Motif strives for I'm sure. Plus side was, a few incremental stability improvements and customer support was quick.P.S. Responding to Motif's reply: - As mentioned, the templates available weren't suitably dense for our needs, we wanted one with 8-12 images per page default interspersed with feature images. We wish there were more diverse design templates. - We did start duplicating the project AFTER we lost one book. Didn't see mention in onboarding that you should duplicate your project to protect your progress. I'm surprised Motif hasn't developed  functionality to revert to previous versions. Really framed the experience for us. - we write a review and then we have to go to another site and input feature requests. Not very customer centric.

started out in Europe it was a EU operation out of Pragnow purchased by a USA company operating from tennessee SHIPPING costs are HighPLUS 20 percent added value taxes,last book was over $150 previously around $100 probably the best software but sadly not affordable for Europeans

The finished book for about 300,- € did not contain all photos that were uploaded. The proof showed no signs of unprintable photos. We still set up a complaint in a timely manner. Otherwise, the service is very good as always, reliable app, good integration in photos and speedy delivery.

Firstly parcel  not yet arrived. Also I am frustrated at paying over £10 per order. I’ve paid over £20 in shipping for 2 photo books in the last 2 weeks.  You really need to be able to combine orders so customers can complete multiple projects and order batch.

Review.Titre: The software is amazing but images are pixelated
Review.Contenu: The software is amazing but the print quality was terrible. If you look close, you can see all of the pixels and anything like skin tones with shading looks fuzzy. I am so bummed because we spent hours working on it and over $100, but it just looks like a cheap home print job. The paper is beautiful as is the binding but the photos, all of which showed up as high enough resolution, look fuzzy and pixelated.

Shipping cost is ridiculous! $1.19 card, $12.00 shipping (default price). (4 cards @ $4.80 total  = $48.00 shipping cost)Got it down to $5.00Both options for a $1.19 product, I will use many competitor options that don’t take advantage of their customers!

The book itself is perfect, but the pictures on the coverpage are not placed correctly. I complained about that with the support and send pictures, but the support was not very eager to understand my complaint. The told me to sent a new cover with properly placed pictures. What I received was a complte new book with wrongly placed pictures as the first time. Its a waste of resources without making me happy :-((

Review.Titre: Make sure to look at the measurements
Review.Contenu: I’ve been doing yearly albums for several years. It turns out that the album categories changed. This year’s album is half the size 😞 I’m quite disappointed ☹️

Review.Titre: Quality has gone down and shipping is careless
Review.Contenu: Paper and print quality has gone down since I last printed a motif book 2-3 years ago. Also 2 of my 3 books arrived with crushed corners. The box was broken and dirty.
Final book looked great, but it’s just too expensive, even with a discount. Will use another service next time

Review.Titre: Quality not good anymore and lost order
Review.Contenu: A lot of problems. First order in March…somehow got lost. Now, ups delivery, a lot of of problems with delivery. But worst: just opened the book and the quality of the pictures is very bad!!! Other books were better in the past! What changed? Not worth the money anymore.
Ups do not delivery at home but at the ups point for no reason and without giving notice. The cost of delivery is therefore too high

Apparently a blank page inserted, perhaps my error, but other companies have asked about potential problems before developing. Also, cover arrived with tear, as it’s a gift, disappointing to pass on. Quality of photos is good though.
The quality of the pictures (taken from a professionell photograph) is not good!
I’ve ordered many great books from Motif. This one was sub-par. Fuzzy and grainy pictures. Pretty disappointed this time around..
the pictures were slightly dark..they could have been a bit brighterother wise all was good

Review.Titre: Got 3-4 pages totally blank white pages…
Review.Contenu: Got 3-4 pages totally blank white pages imbedded in the book

Review.Titre: Faulty delivery but responsive client service
Review.Contenu: Unfortunately, the book was delivered with 9 printed pages and 31 empty pages. After complaining about just getting a 20% on resubmitting the project and writing a bad review, I was offered a refund as well as a free reprint. It remains to see whether the photo book will be delivered as submitted this time round.

I created a book (2 copies), and I did, during what I thought was during a discounted period. (It was). But when I checked out the discount was not applied automatically and if there was a place to insert the code (Sum40 I think) it was not apparent. When I called the Motif help line, which was clearly a call center, they only told me I could cancel the order and repeat the order. I asked for a supervisor but was not granted this request. The book looks nice but service is poor and I should have been granted this request. I spent over $115 but should have been 40% less, and it should have been easy to refund that to my card. Other photo sites are in existence so Motif needs to improve.

Loved the app and designing the photobook was easy. Lovely designs. I went with Motif as they state they are the best photobook for iPhones pictures. Order on express delivery. Order dates given were within my timescales but when emailed customer services to confirm delivery date, the dates given was AFTER the original guaranteed date. Customer services are impersonal.
Thought your software has improved somewhat, it has a long way to go.  Very few options in making a photo book.  Given that you are the vendor for Apple., you really should be much, much better.

Review.Titre: I admit that the problems may very well…
Review.Contenu: I admit that the problems may very well have been my own ineptitude. I’m an old man unaccustomed to dealing with such apps in general. However, I was disappointed to find that a few of the photos I had thought I had included were missing, as was the very few texts I had intended to include.  Even if it is just my own fault, perhaps the process could be made more idiot-proof.

Review.Titre: I called to cancel due to a format…
Review.Contenu: I called to cancel due to a format issue within 12 hours.  Was told it should be fine so I resubmitted with changes made.  The next day got an email declining my refund but gave me a discount on a future order. I had already sent the update because it was a gift and time sensitive. They would not apply the discount because I ordered on my own first. Paid for 4 calendars full price to use only 2 of them 😡

I ordered a soft copy photo book for my daughter for Christmas, when it arrived I was not happy with the quality but chalked it up to the book being a soft cover and that was of my choosing. I redid the book as a hardcover, adding more pages and pictures. I would have been happy with the final project except some of the pages, had batches of sepia colored photos throughout. These same pictures were normal in the original. 😥 book.
This book was painful to make!  The website kept freezing on me and was so slow it took me so long to do I don’t think I’ll use it again

Review.Titre: Loading the book failed several times…
Review.Contenu: Loading the book failed several times and I was charged multiple times without having a confirmed order.  I still have a charge pending on my account 14 days after it having failed to go through.  Book quality good but a very poor ordering experience.

Review.Titre: Motif--good app ruined by lousy text process
Review.Contenu: The procedures for adding text to a book in Motif Photos are opaque and DO NOT WORK.  It is way too complicated and frustrating to add text.  It is so bad that I am looking for another app that will let me use my photos on my Mac easily and with text to make books.  The other aspects of the bookmaking process are fine--adding photos, resizing, formatting a page.  But the addition of text is SO OBNOXIOUS that I hope never to use Motif again.

The app was easy to navigate and pictures uploaded without a problem. My problem with this purchase is when I received the book. In one week two pages have already fallen out! $80.00 is too much to pay for something like this and have it fall apart so soon. I will not be using this app again.

Review.Titre: I already told you not to contact him as this was a gift fro me.
Review.Contenu: I already told you not to continue sending info to Valentine Razo as he is the person I had the book shipped to, whereas I,am the one who paid for it via,my billing address.  So stop asking reviews from him.  Thank you.

Review.Titre: Not really sure of the timeline for…
Review.Contenu: Not really sure of the timeline for receiving the photo book.  Per the order email it says 6-11 business days.  I am still waiting for my project at 21 days from purchase.  If this timeline was stated at the order purchase time my frustration would be less.  Hopefully the book arrives and I am blown away with its quality for the price!Still waiting...

Really like the layout. Concept is easy to use and that’s amazing, BUT, I have lost so many books due to unexpectedly shutting down that it’s wasted lots of my time. If you remove pictures off your iPhoto then they are lost from your book. Not that good if you need to make space. Printing is hit and miss. Some pics are good quality while others look grainy, even after correcting all the pictures they tag with a warning.

The album came quickly and was of good quality however 2/3 of the photo album had pixelated pictures and were unrecognizable. We sent an email through their submission form online and got no response. It was very difficult to find the Canadian contact number. The Canadian contact was very good and responded quickly however a week later we are still waiting to hear back as to whether or not we get a new album.

Review.Titre: I ordered several books and your rating…
Review.Contenu: I ordered several books and your rating system does not identify the book it is asking to rate.  I have one issue. I ordered a hardback book and the Back page photo on the jacket was fine but the same photo on the hardback book cut one person off and that was one of the more important points to that particular photo. So I am very disappointed in that particular book.

Review.Titre: Not as good as the old iPhoto bookmaking program
Review.Contenu: Compared to the old iPhoto program I used to use to create books, I found Motif awkward and lacking. There wasn’t a layout I liked. I had to make do with one that didn’t really fit my theme. The text features were clumsy and it was hard to make changes. Mainly I miss having a spiral bound softcover option. Also charging $9,95 for shipping that took 9 days to arrive is unacceptable in today’s market.

Review.Titre: The book was pretty much as expected
Review.Contenu: The book was pretty much as expected. However, one thing I don’t like is that some pictures are blurry so I think they’re weren’t high enough quality for the spot where I put them. Overall Shutterfly is much better with the design and options and with alerting you to picture quality. I only tried motif because I have an iPhone and the picture file type is only compatible with motif.

Review.Titre: The instructional videos that you show…
Review.Contenu: The instructional videos that you show on your website do not show all of the things that dont work easily or well when you are trying to put together a book. Too many specific things to mention here. VERY frustrating and took huge amounts of time to try to m make things work.The book printed quickly and arrived quickly, so that's something positive to say.

The photo album layout was ok but just ok - there were more options for interesting layouts of multiple photos, maps and text boxes in the original Apple application.  One of our photos in the album turned out very blurry and it was not identified in the screening to have any resolution problems.  That turned a great project into a disappointment quickly.

Quality excellent! BUT: 1. Could not change default font on cover template. 2. Despite ordering what was presumed to be in time for Christmas delivery, I was disappointed to follow my order's tracking and see it languish in a UPS depot in Illinois from 12/20 to 12/26 for eventual delivery on 12/27, missing the party where it was intended as a gift.

Review.Titre: Poor quality photos and poor quality…
Review.Contenu: Poor quality photos and poor quality system with no way to delete photos to make multiple similar books without having to create a new album in photos 1st.  Poor customer service. It took them long to respond after several attempts.  The response did not resolve the lighting issues with the photos & some of their responses didn't even make sense.

Review.Titre: Book has a trim error and no response from customer service
Review.Contenu: This was my second photo book to order through Motif. Like the first one, I was very pleased with the ease of putting it together; with the price; and with its general price. Unlike the first one - which was perfect - this one has a trim error along the top edge of the front cover. I contacted customer service via email according to the information provided with my invoice. To date I have not heard back from them. Accordingly, I am disappointed as this was a gift.

Review.Titre: Postage too high and delivery too slow.
Review.Contenu: The time it takes to receive the cards/books is long at 6 to 11 days. The amount of postage to send a card is exorbitant. I would understand if the price of the card was higher and the postage lower.  The quality of the photos and the creation S/W is good.I hope this helps but the iPhoto app was far better. Sorry but I'm just telling you my experience.Jim

It’s really expensive to create and order albums.  Also I didn’t find a way to export the files in pdf version.  Previously with the albums integrated into photos, this was possible.  Also when you go out of the program, it doesn’t keep your work and you have to start from scratch.  If there’s a way, it’s well hidden and I haven’t figured it out properly.

Review.Titre: the book quality is ok but the colors…
Review.Contenu: the book quality is ok but the colors of the photos are poor. The color and light of the photo reproduction was just very disappointing. We had amazing high-quality pics in there-- some with stupefying light and even those were dark, off-color, and more monotone.Fine for ordinary events to document an experience but not to really delight in the photography.

Review.Titre: We had a very difficult time adding…
Review.Contenu: We had a very difficult time adding text captions to our photo album. When the completed book arrived we were disappointed because the text font was not to our liking, and the lines of text were printed too close to the photos. We know now the reason for the crowding of the text boxes to the photos, but it would have been better to have learned in advance.

Review.Titre: I loved the old apple photo books
Review.Contenu: I loved the old apple photo books.  I find the others, such as Motif, have limitations in editing photos and dropping photos in the page templates.  I recently ordered 3 copies of a photobook and one page has a single photo dropped into the one-photo template which appeared clearly to be centred in the page.  However, when I received the books, the photo was not at all centred and is a real disappointment to me.  It clearly appeared centred when I submitted my order.

Review.Titre: Moving pictures and title on the books
Review.Contenu: I didn’t like that you could not move pictures around within the book. For example from the bottom left corner to top right corner. I had to delete the picture and find it again in hundreds of pics at the bottom. Also I wish the title could appear at the end of the book so you can see which one it is on the bookshelf. We have used Apple Books for years and this year they changed it.

Review.Titre: It's not intuitive, poor quality printing
Review.Contenu: It's not intuitive to drag and drop photos into the queue of "available photos" nor is it intuitive to drag and drop to replace an existing photo. The quality of the product was poor and the edits made to the original photos was not reflected in the printed product. Every picture had more "black line" in it than the digital images, which just shows that the printers used are not quality.

Review.Titre: I really wish there were more options…
Review.Contenu: I really wish there were more options for the background color for layouts, the designs of the books, and layout options also.  I hate doing text with Motif because there are no larger text spaces available.  Also if you make one wrong click with text it comes back to haunt you when you check out,  With iPhoto you could just delete not he spot and it was over.  The photo quality of the books has been good.  But I have to say I enjoyed working in iPhoto so much more.

The picture book is as expected, but the checkout process is completely unsatisfactory.I had multiple instances where I selected regular shipping during checkout, then the final bills showed expedited shipping with s substantial upcharge.  Last I heard this problem still has not been fixed.  The onus should not be on the customer to find recurring incorrect charges.

I liked the Apple photobook creator better, but unfortunately it is no longer available. Motif is more expensive and more difficult to use.  It does not allow adding text.Subsequently to my original review I did find where the button is to add text - it as shown as Aa next to the button for the page layout - I think it would be more user friendly just to say "text" :-)I still find it less intuitive than the Apple program.

Review.Titre: I used this ap to make a small book…
Review.Contenu: I used this ap to make a small book several months ago.  It was WAY too hard to use.  Getting text onto each page was an aggravating challenge.  I want to put text where I want it and in different ways on each page.  I wish you would fix this fast and thoroughly. I will try one more time next year (soon), and if it isn't really easy to do text, I won't be using this ap again.  You could at least provide a way to chat with a human being and go step by step to get it right.

Review.Titre: The photos with text were cropped wrong
Review.Contenu: The photos with text were cropped and you cannot read all the first letters on the left margin.Really bad production of precisely framed texts!

Overall the book was fine. However the cover was a big disappointment. And because the cover and the back cover are the first thing you see it really spoiled the opinion of the entire book. On the front cover there was a big border on the left side and a small border on the right side. It was not centered. I wrote to the company I have not received any return message. Not sure right now how I feel about using them again. BYW I ordered 4 books so it makes me four times more disappointed.

Service was fast,. BUT quality of prints on calendar was horrible,.. horrible.  very disappointed ,. was gift for mother in law, which we do traditionally every year.  In past years the direct service of calendar, photo book etc. with Apple (which does not exist anymore) worked really well,. prints always looked good.   I will not be using Motif again.

Found it difficult to edit and the largest zoom was still very small. The program kept crashing with the notice that it quit unexpectedly. There was always a fear that the program would erase/delete all progress. There was limited ability to alter the size of the photos squares.Final product looked pretty good though.

Review.Titre: I am happy with the final product
Review.Contenu: I am happy with the final product, but had a number of issues while making it.  Many times, I would finish placing text and photos on a page only to have the program quit.  Sometimes the page and been saved, but often it had not and I had to start the page over again.Also, when I went to order, I learned that the text did not fit the space on a number of pages.  It would have been so much easier if I had known that as I worked.I do like the quality of the book, and I like all the options for formatting photos and text.

Review.Titre: It was very hard to manipulate as I was…
Review.Contenu: It was very hard to manipulate as I was used to making my photo books with iPhoto. It seemed like a few unnecessary steps before I could get the photos transferred and it took me two days to do one book that normally takes one sitting. then one of my books had duplicate pages with the exact same pictures and format.

Review.Titre: I ordered my calendar on New Years Day
Review.Contenu: I ordered my calendar on New Years Day, and it arrived today. Since it was a gift, I was concerned that it still hadn’t arrived yesterday, and called Motif, where I was told to wait one more day to see if it arrived since I chose economy shipping. The calendar may be fine but using UPS who then hand off the calendar to USPS for final delivery is just not a very good policy since it took 17 days for delivery and there were 2 separate tracking numbers. I had to call UPS to get the USPS tracking number.

I found the process very difficult & tedious—especially the final edit whereby everything kept reloading & repeating. There is no “spellcheck” feature, so despite enlarging font in the editing process, I STILL found a spelling error in my final book. The final product is lovely, but not sure it’s worth the extra work, frustration AND expense. The only advantage that I could find was that the app did use a few pictures that were HEIC, not all in my collection were jpg to my surprise! I’m going back to Shutterfly.

I ordered calendars to be printed. The photo had such poor quality it was embarrassing to give them as Christmas gifts. All the photos had streaks that ran vertically,look like the rollers from the printer on wet ink. Next time I’ll use Walgreens. Also I wasn’t able to have the holidays printed on the calendar, disappointing.

My book looks nice. So I can’t fault the actual printing process. But the process of laying out the book was like pulling teeth! Text boxes would appear and then be difficult to delete, sizing of photos and text boxes was difficult, and elements on the page were connected to one another. I won’t use Motif again.

Review.Titre: I love Motif, not their customer service
Review.Contenu: I love Motif, however, I had a problem with the text boxes that I described in detail when I emailed & asked for assistance.It was obvious by the response from Motif that I just got the canned, standard "text box" answer.  I specifically stated the problem & I'm sure it wasn't read in detail.  If it had been, the response wouldn't have been what was sent to me.The good news is that I figured it out myself & I was happy with the photo book.Please be more sensitive to the needs of the customer. TY

All of my images were high quality digital images but many photos in the book are grainy and most are dark. I ordered a book from Mixbook 2 weeks ago and that one is excellent. The quality of the Motif book doesn't come close. I'm disappointed because I found the software easy to use.

Review.Titre: Bad experience due to partial shipment
Review.Contenu: Bad experience due to partial shipment. We had originally ordered 750 cards and only received 350 cards, therefore went ahead to order 500 more cards as replacement since we needed to get cards sent out ASAP. Currently disputing invoice ($). Should not have been charged for additional 500 cards even though we eventually ended up receiving second portion of original 750 cards over a week later. These cards needed to be sent out on a specific date and we missed that deadline due to partial shipment mishap.

I produce every year a calendar with photopaintings, which in the past were printed by Apple with good quality. Since Apple has abandoned these services i went with the Motif app. The quality of the prints is disappointing, the colors dull, the paper cheap. Not acceptable if you want your artwork to shine.

Definitely not as easy as it used to be using Apple's printing.  I found it challenging to find how to add special occasions to the monthly calendar.  Also, I tried to import a previously made calendar and update it...  it was a complete mess.  I should have just started from scratch.  The actual calendar printed nicely, but it wasn't really the gift I had intended on giving, but I didn't have the time to explore other options or dive into the details of how Motif works (as it wasn't intuitive).
Inferior bindingThe book materials are great and the pictures came out lovely.  The binding of the soft covered book is not stable and pulls apart easily.  Not good for long term.

Review.Titre: I was disappointed in the picture…
Review.Contenu: I was disappointed in the picture quality sent in both the calendars and books I ordered.  All the photos were overexposed with too much contrast.  On my computer it looked fine but when the printed versions came it was different.  It was my first time using Motif now that Apple is out of the business.

Review.Titre: Not as happy as I wanted to be-  your…
Review.Contenu: Not as happy as I wanted to be-  your print margin area is not as clear as it could be -  for instance-  you show a shadow of the inside stitching area-  but you really should show some margin on the outside-  your printing versus your allowance in placing is slightly different.

I never received a response to my customer request right after sending the file over. The quality of pictures in the final product were mixed.  I know I have varied quality in the images but there were several I would never have sent if I could have previewed them somehow.

Review.Titre: I designed my photo book on the iPhone…
Review.Contenu: I designed my photo book on the iPhone app, and I am extremely disappointed with the results. Some of the pictures that I cropped and resized to display the subject were not correctly printed. The book itself is flimsy and the binding for a softcover photo book is not acceptable. The pictures run into the binding and the images are not completely visible. Why does the proof that I designed in not show the edges of pages? I would prefer to have a wire binding and an application that shows where the photo will be placed on the page and where the binding will be attached.

Review.Titre: This is the second book I ordered from…
Review.Contenu: This is the second book I ordered from you. The first book came out great, This book was very disappointing. I used the same camera to take the pictures but the picture quality was poor. Almost every one of the pictures was not sharp.I don't I will order any more books from you.

Review.Titre: you should help to catch things that…
Review.Contenu: you should help to catch things that are clearly wrong, that would be helpful.  and the website is super glitchy so i have at least once if not twice order two books by accident.  you should know not to do both when the website doesnt  look like its order went through...

Review.Titre: Not a great or easy project...
Review.Contenu: Great interface, but the app froze & quit every 5-7 minutes and I had to re-open, load pictures and continue my project. It took several hours to make the calendar. And then once I got it, it looked great but pictures were very dark! I miss the Apple calendar interface for sure.

Review.Titre: Move one page at a time, not two
Review.Contenu: When reviewing entire project, can only move two pages at a time to organize final appearance.  This is a big problem.  It should be possible to reorganize by moving one page at a time.  Otherwise, disorder is hard to avoid.  You have yet to equal what Apple offered.

Review.Titre: Good product, but terrible purchase experience
Review.Contenu: I was happy with my experience creating a calendar with the Photos plug-in, but when I went to order six copies and had to create a new account with a different email address for each physical mailing address, I decided I would no longer be using the service after this project.

Clunky and exceptionally slow.  Makes one irate to order 6 calendars and have to pay 6 shipping fees. Other companies call them ‘shopping carts’. You need to wake up to modern technology.  If you hadn’t wheedled the tie in to Apple I would not use your service

Product comes out great!  Customer service is horrible! (besides no phone number! Email only!) I had difficulty applying a discount code to my order..As books take a very long time to make I figured I would order the item and then immediately contact customer service to correct the billing issue.. Motif would NOT correct the problem and told me to start over with a new promo code after I had placed the order...That did not help me in any way! Thats extremely poor customer service! No wonder apple dropped them as a vendor....I'll be looking at a different company next time...

Review.Titre: Was unable to add text or captions to…review
Review.Contenu: Was unable to add text or captions to the photos.  Didn’t realize size of calendar until it arrived.  Are there size options? Inserting of events in days of the week was bit confusing. Looked like they were added a day later than desired. Confusing.

If you are deciding between Motif and MINT - I would go with MINT.Unlike Motif, which is run by robots, MINT actually pairs you with an Art director who reviews your photos for quality and resolution prior to printing. I will never use Motif again.

Review.Titre: Good handling of pictures but poor text…
Review.Contenu: Good handling of pictures but poor text handling, especially hidden text boxes that cannot then be found and eliminated, this stopping production and requiring deletion of the whole project when almost completed. On line and phone “help” of no use.

Review.Titre: I was very disappointed with the…
Review.Contenu: I was very disappointed with the promise of discount promotion, several times I tried and every time it refused and said I didn’t qualify. If you don’t honour the promotional discount don’t bother offering it.

The software was easy enough to use. However, when I had finished my book, I pressed the Command "Z" function to modify a change I had made to my book and the entire thing erased. I couldn't undo it and had to redo the entire thing. I received the book slightly damaged - I ordered a softcover and it was bent across the spine. I thought that the quality of the printed photos was okay... I expected better. It was a tad pixilated on some of the photos but not others, which confused me. I will not be using this service again. It was relatively cheap in price - I paid for exactly what I got.

Review.Titre: I’ve had my book for about a week
Review.Contenu: I’ve had my book for about a week. It is the second one I have done with you. I am not at all happy with the quality of the pictures. They are too dark. I have been happy with customer service when I called for help. Thank you.

I was very disappointed in the finished photo book.  I had done four photo books using the Apple printing app , all using my iPhone photos without a problem. This book should have been the same but it was of poor quality and expensive to boot.
Little late on shipping. Pictures looked good. Everything was how I made it. The pages started tearing from the middle when you turn the pages the first day I got it.

Review.Titre: I like putting my own book together
Review.Contenu: I like putting my own book togetherWhen i tried to move a picture it totally  deleted itnot as user friendly as you think I am no sure but i guess you have to edit before you can createJust overall had a better picture album with Apple Books

First, your website isn't very easy to use when it comes to the purchasing function - I inadvertently ordered 1 card instead of 100 cards. When I realized the error, I reordered, found how to make the quantity 100 cards and, since I'd lost so much time, added $19.95 to expedite the cards. The cards came but they weren't my cards, they were another family's cards (which I still have). I asked to have mine reprinted and overnighted at your expense which, thankfully, you did. But no one on your customer service side responded on how to return the wrong cards even though I asked twice. Not a great experience.

Review.Titre: I wasted 5 days with this software
Review.Contenu: I wasted 5 days trying to produce a calendar. Your software doesn’t work with Apple photos when stored in iCloud. I had to move all of my images to a second Mac that wasn’t linked so I could finish the calendar. I then had to pay thru the nose to expedite shipping due to the five days I lost. What’s also frustrating is that images on the first attempt simply vanished after I had completed it. Since I couldn’t print a proof I could never get the finished calendar to match. Your software pretty much matched the old Apple software so it had all the features which your competitors lack. That was good. The one feature you lacked was reliability.

Review.Titre: The quality of the printing was poor
Review.Contenu: The quality of the printing was poor, colors were dull and images were grainy. The binding actually fell apart within a few days! I have sewn it back together. I got a similar book a few years ago thru apple and it was much better.
Your app doesn’t show how much of the picture will be tucked into the binding so 4 of my pictures were ruined and I had to request a total refund. Your pages are too Thick.

Hi People at Motif,The package of calendars arrived with one end fallen out of the package with the calendars exposed and dog eared in the corners, but not enough to send them back.  It seems your packaging needs to be sturdier.

Review.Titre: Poor photo quality on Portrait calendar
