Review.Contenu: I found out at the last minute that the company I usually order my calendar Christmas gifts from is no longer providing that service.  I decided to give Motif a try. I ordered 7 landscape calendars and 8 portrait collage calendars.  The quality of the calendar itself was very high, however, the photo quality was not as good overall.  The landscape photos turned out satisfactory but many of the portrait photos were grainy and dark in some spots.  I exported all photos with the same settings so I'm not sure why there was such a difference between them.  I was not very excited to give my calendar this year but I didn't have the time or money to reorder.

First let me say that the calendar I made turned out very nice. That being said, it wasn't quite as easy as it looks (drag and drop), yes but, there was a lot of adjustments to be made and adding text isn't all that easy. Changing fonts and sizing etc. Then it was over $100.00 for three calendars which seems like a lot to me.

It is difficult to have a different layout for different months of the calendar because I keep having to pull up the layout option and delete what it puts up to select the layout I want. I also have to be careful to not mix high key photos with low key photos on the same page or it throws the exposure of the whole page. If I am giving a calendar as a gift I have to be sure I leave enough time for it to be reprinted in case one photo throws the exposure of the entire page. Something in the app to show how it sees the page exposure would be helpful. Otherwise I would need  the ability to create the composite outside of Motif and import it, but for that I need the exact aspect and dimensions the app will use.

Review.Titre: I have made and ordered books with…
Review.Contenu: I have made and ordered books with motif for sometime now.  Always a good experience.  However, this time my book arrived with pages all wavy and the book was not flat due to wavy pages.Otherwise book looks good and like I said typically a positive experience with this company.

I have been your Calendars customer for the last few years, every time you change the ways to enter my details which makes me very nervous This year you even force me to accept add on words on the front page and the back page also or otherwise I couldn’t complete my orderPlease give me a choice to do it in my favorite way. Otherwise everything is Okay Looking forward for your improvements in the coming year

Review.Titre: Great quality cards but often too dark and expensive postage
Review.Contenu: I love the general quality of cards and the ease of preparation. Communication is excellent from ordering to receipt with a very reliable email service re delivery.However, there is a constant issue with photographs submitted being too dark. I realise that Macs have very bright screens and compensate for this but even so, some cards with lots of midtones and shadows are unusable. Also, the offers with free postage have stopped....postage is astronomical and stops me from getting cards as often as I used to do.

I started using Motif a few years ago to make a family calendar as a Christmas gift for my parents.  I have seen the price of the calendar increase significantly over the years and this year, the cost was an average $46 to produce just ONE calendar and ship it to family members. The fact I order multiple calendars (11 this year) means any increase hits the pocket book hard, and this year has been the hardest.  I'm extremely disappointed in the price increases and the fact I may no longer be able to afford the services of Motif.

The page layout software worked very well, and the automated photo layout was good, only had to move around a couple of images. I ordered a book from Motif years back, and the image quality was outstanding, using 6 megapixel images. The image quality for the book ordered this year was disappointing, noisy images that were easily noticeable.

Review.Titre: I ordered holiday cards on 12/2 and was…
Review.Contenu: I ordered holiday cards on 12/2 and was given a delivery date of 12/11. They never came until 12/20.
I was pleased with the quality of my first order a year ago but this time the photos were on the dark side and not super crisp. For that reason I’ll think twice before ordering another MOTIF project.
Ive been purchasing your books annually.  The price has gone up to the point where I can only afford the paperback books now.I'll be looking for an alternative with better pricing next time
The book turned out quite well; however, I did not find the program very easy to work with.  It was not nearly as user friendly as other photo book programs I’ve used.  I won’t use it again.

The book I recently received, apparently, was produced by Mimeo instead of Motif. While the outer packaging was identical, inside the book was not enclosed in a clear plastic sleeve like previous books we have purchased through Motif. The overall quality of the book was good, but somehow did not seem quite up to par with previous books. Also, the receipt in the box was from Mimeo, and all it supplied was (supposedly) a URL to their web site support page; loading the URL produced a screen that said the page no longer exists! Looking through the Mimeophotos.com web site there was no where on the site (even on the “support” pages) to raise order issues or even contact a Mimeo representative in any way. Using an email link I had recorded from previous books for Motif I was able to contact a Mimeo rep, but if you don’t have that old email address good luck getting any help from these guys.

Review.Titre: The first book I ordered arrived with a…
Review.Contenu: The first book I ordered arrived with a cracked spine and had to be replaced.
Book was nice overall, but developed a crease rather quickly!

Review.Titre: The little photo book is nice but….
Review.Contenu: The little photo book is nice..  sadly the quality of the prints is quite inferior to the photos I used. I don’t know if there is an uploading problem but they are washed out and fuzzy. I used high resolution images and the book is small.   the last photo book I had made was when Apple was still printing and it was far superior.  I am not totally displeased but not happy enough to try again.. UNLESS there is some way to increase the quality.   the book itself is very nice.
better than nothing but not easy to move photos around

Finished product very expensive $550. I was disappointed that a lot of photos included in my album to be included were excluded because not big enough to insure proper printing,  most of those were full frame photos that had been cropped somewhat but surely not to the extent, they wouldn't print in small size. Did not know how to get them included any way.

1. Quality, appearance and color reproduction are excellent. The photographic paper stock is substantial, and the wire hanger is appreciated.2. Communication with technical help is excellent: friendly and prompt.3. Choice of tools to personalize the calendar is limited, but perhaps adequate for the majority of users.4. Dimensions of the calendar - photographers who wish to display their work in the same ratio of width-to-height that their camera produces will be disappointed. The 13"x10 1/2" dimensions of the calendar will force any photograph to be cropped to fit. For those to whom cropping is not a problem, this will not be an issue.  For  serious photographers who would like to display their images as they framed them, it would be greatly appreciated if Motif Photos would build into their software the ability to accomodate photos as they were taken. This would make it possible to display photos as they were intended to be seen. Adjustable border areas would be required.

Review.Titre: Pretty Good, Could be Better like using the app and tutorials are…
Review.Contenu: I like using the app and tutorials are helpful. Quality of the final book is pretty good. But I am unhappy that the staff does NOT look at the book in advance and share any concerns/suggestions about improving it. The “review” is completely automatic it seems.

I've enjoyed the motif platform to created by book.However not a fan of the printer company that they work with mimeo.The pages of my 30 page softcover book came apart from the bind once I opened the book. I've ordered 300+ pages of photobooks from various photobook companies and have not had this issue. I am quite disappointed by the quality of the book and the response I received of how it was my fault that the pages fell out of the book. Anyways, great service to organize and create photobooks. Horrible partnership with mimeo.

Review.Titre: I think the printing is done well
Review.Contenu: I think the printing is done well. I just have a hard time with the “less than” software. I used a program called Heritage Maker that included so much flexibility, unfortunately, they went out of business. This was number seven of the same style of books I have made. Motif has fewer features than I would like to have.

The program wasn't as user friendly as in previous projects with Apple. The selections of backgrounds and themes was limited and some of the photographs were a little difficult to see because they seemed caught up in the spine. The book was well packaged and arrived within the 8 days.

Review.Titre: Too much red in skin tones
Review.Contenu: Much of our book came out great and reminds us of a great trip.However...There are a few pages where skin tones came out very red. Noticeably so. And, it does leave us with regrets.On screen, those skin tones look great. Skin tones with other images in the book look great. It is just a few pages where things didn't meet expectations.I am a graphic designer, and have been to more press checks than I can count. If I was doing a press check on this, I would have asked they cut back the magenta or pull it off the press.

Review.Titre: Nothing wrong with quality and speed of…
Review.Contenu: Nothing wrong with quality and speed of filling order.  I do not like the way text boxes can be moved around on the format. It need to be able to be moved around on the pages with ease.

La livraison a été reçue dans les temps, le livreur n'a pas sonné étant données l'état du paquet, il a mis l'ensemble du paquet dans la boite au lettre, je pense que le paquet a été rangé à coup de pied, les livrets sont donc abimés, heureusement légèrement. Mais c'est tout de même incroyable. Pour information je travaille à domicile.The delivery was received on time, the deliveryman didn't ring the bell given the state of the package, he put the whole package in the letterbox, I think the package was kicked away, so the booklets are damaged, fortunately slightly. But it's unbelievable all the same. For your information, I work from home.

Review.Titre: I did not find the colour very vivid
Review.Contenu: I did not find the colour very vivid, although the layouts were easy to use.

First of all, i don’t speak and write well in English. So i will write in french and you need to translate with an application. Tanks for your understanding. Je suis satisfaite de l’album, par contre, j’apprécierais que vous offriez la version en couverture souple en format 8x11.

I like Motif as it works on my Mac Powerbook, and the results have been good, overall. However, it is difficult to work on Motif on a laptop as the text boxes are hard to read when the font gets below 20. As a result, I did have a number of typos so I'll be redoing the book to correct the typos. Double check your work. Also, the page templates can be confining. I am generally pleased with the integration with Apple, & the final product can be good. Just be careful.

Review.Titre: My EU country suddenly dropped from their delivery options
Review.Contenu: Motif seems to have been taken over by another company. The outcome was that whereas the album creation was as before, the quality is very marginally down and they let me know after uploading that they no longer deliver to my region (Luxembourg - EU). To save the work I had put in, I had to have it sent to friends in Belgium. The helpline was responsive, but offered no way to correct the situation.

Review.Titre: Because one does not have to transfer…
Review.Contenu: Because one does not have to transfer photos makes this a very easy process.  However, the end product, book, was not up to the same standard of other companies I have dealt with. For example the binding seems very flimsy and poorly made.  In the future, I will consider other companies.  Also, the quality of the paper was inferior to others!  Your price is also higher so one would expect a better product rather than a poorer one.

Review.Titre: I still do not have my photo book, but…
Review.Contenu: I still do not have my photo book that I ordered almost 3 weeks ago. After receiving some rather unfriendly e-mails ("you did not choose the right shipping option, your estimated arrival date is 8/14", which is in another almost 3 weeks), someone at motif obviously read my not very pleasant review and send a long and apologetic response. I now am offered a refund and a reimbursement of the shipping costs. Thank you! It is nice to know, that there are people at motif that care. I love to write positive reviews and hope to be able to do so for motif in the future.
Very Classic …Not possible to have special design

Liked the simplicity. Lacks many of the features of other photo book companies (stagger photos on page, more backgrounds and colors to choose from, a reminder if you have used a photo more than once, etc)

My book, Redwoods, was disappointing. The colors, especially those that framed the photos, were quite a bit darker than in the editing samples. They lacked the richness of your samples. Also, the text box can be a real pain, but that may be my problem. My real complaint is with the color. I have had many books printed by Motif and my experience has been quite positive to date.

For some reason, once I ordered my book and then went back into my project there were no photos in it - so I could not order another book without starting completely over. It was saved, so I do not understand.  It should remain until I delete it.  Also, there should be more options on designs and layouts.

Review.Titre: Good for pics, bad for text
Review.Contenu: I like how easy it is to enter images and move them around. For text though it is very difficult to use. Simply the fact that you lose your text if you don‘t click outside the Textbox before moving onto something else made it a very frustrating process.

The quality of the paper was good.  Binding was also good. Very little wait time to receive the book after it was ordered.  I was disappointed that many of my pictures were not sharp.  The old Mac book album would give a warning if photos were going to look blurry when blown up.  This app did not.  Also it was difficult to add captions under pictures.

Thé qu’amortit of thé product was there but thé shipment was a bit long. Plus displaying thé price without VAT during thé making process of the album leads to a bad surprise when ordering…. Without thé Mother Day code I would not have proceed.

The quality and the user interface is good. What was not so pleasant was the pricing, saying it´s 19,99€ + VAT and at the end (after one spend a lot of work and doesn´t want to cancel) it´s more than 38,00€ with tax and delivery...

The support team was great…very helpful.The delivery company was terrible. It was the worst delivery experience I have ever had. Fortunately, Mohammed was able to intervene and I got my product.After I picked it up, they sent me about 3 notices to come and pick it up.
Interface while uploading the project was confusing (error message), and help from the help desk was friendly but useless. Also, the whole service is too expensive for the result.

Review.Titre: The quality in times of original Motif…
Review.Contenu: The quality in times of original Motif was much better, as a sample the paper quality of the dust jacket was quite more impressive than the delivered material from „mimeo“, the pages are no longer cut so cleanly….lesser quality for a higher price seems to be the cost for this take over…I will now have a look around for a competitor who will deliver the usual quality….

Review.Titre: When I would opt to change page layout
Review.Contenu: When I would opt to change page layout, I found that I could not scroll down to see all options, like I wanted to have 5 photos with text, it would only show me the 5 page layouts without text as the text pages needed to be scrolled down to. I had to keep coming in and out of it to see what I wanted. This is new as it was not like that when I used this app previously.

I had typos that were not corrected. I also didn't like that when i added a folder to mofit the pictures were no longer in order, this was a time suck. Lastly Mofit was more expensive the their competitors.  I used it because it was my first time and i own a mac but i will be shopping price next time.
The album itself is high quality and as expected. The design software, however, is very unintuitive. I'd recommend it only if you don't have a choice because it's apple photos...

Review.Titre: This is not the first book that I have…
Review.Contenu: This is not the first book that I have ordered… I usually order two and give one to my in-laws… It is beautiful quality and color as always however the book that I am keeping for myself had a page completely ripped in it! At first I didn’t know what I was looking at but when I flip the page you could see the white border as the whole top of the page was ripped off. I’ve never had that happen before. But it’s just for myself and I am gifting the other book which does not have a tear. Maybe there was no final check done on this book? Because I don’t see how that could be missed?

Review.Titre: The product looked great when it was…
Review.Contenu: The product looked great when it was delivered but I had to give up on captioning the photos as the app crashed and support couldn't tell me why.

The book was never delivered and had to be republished so I did not have it on time to give as a birthday gift. However, the response from Motif was swift and helpful. I am still waiting for the new book to arrive.
great quality calendar with ability to have a wide choice of page layouts.  However, experience diluted by the cost of shipping which was a third of the total price.

I liked being able to choose the pictures I took to put in the book but I found it difficult to pick a format where I could include some text. And I had to constantly adjust the sizes of photos to fit the format.
Everything was amazing, except the last flap was supposed to be blank but for some reason the template txt was printed there which looks silly.

Review.Titre: This is similar to the old Apple Photos…
Review.Contenu: This is similar to the old Apple Photos application, which I liked very much.  Some of the things that could be improved in Motif are:  You should be able to switch pictures around on a page without having to replace that picture with another from the "deck" and then, from the "deck"  put back the picture you simply wanted to have in a different place on the page.  Also, Motif needs to have more themes from which to choose.  Also, customer service needs improvement.  It took several emails and several days for me to get answers to questions when I was trying to learn how to use Motif.  Also, you need to have a customer service phone number listed in the "Contact Motif" on the website.  Turns out you actually do have a customer service phone number that has real people to talk to, but it took several emails to get you to give it to me.  A chat service would also be nice.Despite the bumps in getting to know how to use Motif, I will definitely use it again.
It is very frustrating no to be able to reduce the size of the picture. Globally, it does not work very well. The latest version is worse than the one before. I do not think I will use it again.

I have made several photo books using Motif and have been very happy with the results. The last book I made the cover of the book was not folded as well as it should have been. The other books did not have this problem.

Review.Titre: I love my photo book but it wasn’t…
Review.Contenu: I love my photo book but it wasn’t easy. The text box was  hard to manage.  It should have appeared where my curser was but it didn’t.  It always appeared on the bottom of the page and I had to move it.  The text box did not move as a unit and I had to move all four sides to position it where I wanted it.It was a struggle.It was expensive.A lovely memory now that it’s done but it was extremely time consuming and painful to execute. I kept thinking there must be an easier way.  I watched the video tutorials many times. Thanks for asking my opinion. No hope you can use my experience in a positive way for your clients. Sincerely, Jenny.

Review.Titre: I was surprised that two pictures which…
Review.Contenu: I was surprised that two pictures which i chosed, appeared two times in the same album . I arranged it on an other way. And i was a bit disappointed

Review.Titre: There was some glue on tree pages
Review.Contenu: There was some glue on tree pages. they were stick together and a bit wrinkled. I succeeded to remove the but the wrinkle stayed in the page. I had the book asa a present and needed it , so I decided to keep it and gave to y brother. He didn't noticed. ( his eyes are not as good as mine)
Title Front page without enough brightness. The previous image was more clear than the reality is
Not as good paper or binding as other Apple picture books. Acceptable, but not much more.
Good experiences in the past but one of my calendars had ruined pictures because the pages came stuck together.
My first time using site, a little more difficult than expected setting up pages and separating groups, quality of product was fine.
not a lot of choice or formats more  expensive than rivals companies
I do find it tricky to drag a file into a new project. But much simpler than other products on the market for Mac users
Delivery time was a week out (having been ten days to begin with).

Review.Titre: Paper was not the same quality as…
Review.Contenu: Paper was not the same quality as previously
The majority of calendar photos were excellent, but three turned out darker than expected.
The Product is very good, But the Time from oder to delivery lasted too long.
Onestly, I was aspecting more from the quality of the pictures

Review.Titre: The quality of the print (color of the…
Review.Contenu: The quality of the print (color of the pictures) is disappointing.
The announced delivery time was not kept at all.

Review.Titre: The past books have been wonderful
Review.Contenu: The past books have been wonderful, for some reason this was not.
Good quality print, but price very expensive!

Review.Titre: It’s a good product YouTube how to use before starting
Review.Contenu: The product is not user friendly but with time and patience I really like the end results.

Review.Titre: Would love to see my photo books
Review.Contenu: Have always been happy with my Motif photo books. I would like to comment on the books but as I have not yet seen them I cannot. I was given A delivery date if Thurs 22Sept then Friday now Tuesday 27th. As now on holiday for a week I have a problem!!!!!! Hope to see them next week🤞🤞🤞🤞

Review.Titre: I wasn't impressed with the quality of…
Review.Contenu: I wasn't impressed with the quality of the photos.

Review.Titre: Photo book quality is just ok, not great
Review.Contenu: I tried Motif because it integrated with my Apple Photo app. The experience of making a photo book was good enough, but the end product didn't wow me. It was just ok. Not something I could give as a gift and feel good. The color and print quality was mediocre.

Review.Titre: Would appreciate being able to put…
Review.Contenu: Would appreciate being able to put pictures closer to each other on each page.I thank you for the opportunity to e-mail questions & that you are open to suggestions.I accepted the update while working in Motif photo & that was a mistake. Next time I will get out of program, do update you send then get back in.I just finished my 8th Motif album.

Motif's A.I. software is fine for people who want to create "My trip to Paris" from an iPhoto album with all their Paris photos, then click "Auto" and let Motif do the rest.  My job required complete manual control, and basic features such as soft edges for photos and drop-shadow for text so it stands out better were entirely foreign to Motif Customer Support.  They had no clue.  So the ability to customize photos and text needs work as does their support.  On the bright side, the printed book was of high quality and it arrived on time.  So Motif delivers a good product if you can figure out the software yourself.

Review.Titre: We had 240 pictures of Canyons we…
Review.Contenu: We had 240 pictures of Canyons we visited but some were repetitive and I thought you would eliminate the ones that re the same but instead you just moved them to different pages.  I have seen other such albums where pictures were set artistically but this was not the case. Pictures were just set on pages with no design. Sorry but I won’t use your services again.

Review.Titre: I enjoy doing my projects with Motif…  But this time the quality was not good
Review.Contenu: I enjoy doing my projects with Motif and have done many books before.  This time everything was good, very timely delivery, however the quality of photos in the book are not good at all.  Some are totally overexposed and the colors are totally wrong.  Not happy this time around.  Would like to know what changed in your printing process?

Unfortunately, there had been a glitch in the printing process and all the pages had a faint white line running from top to bottom. The good news is that when I brought it to the attention of Motif's customer service they immediately notified me that they would send a reprint at no extra charge plus gave me a 20% off credit on a future project.

Motif is rigid and not easy to use - I am an advance user of Photoshop and other Adobe programs. For example retaining one typeface and font does not work on my Mac. And if I stray off the text box I am creating, it defaults to the  Helvetica message. These selections should be retained and global. I think the options for image placement should be more varied or just not have options at all. Let me place my image and arrange it as I like.

I have been using Motif for awhile now so I shouldn’t be surprised when the color is off on their print of my photo. I’ve had problems in the past and even called customer service because their print was so off (the dark areas were just too dark) but he said it was the settings on my computer, how bright my screen was that was making the issue. Maybe that was true but then in this last batch one of the prints was so bad due to the fact that the color was so distorted as to make the photo ugly and this time it had nothing to do with how light or dark it was. To be fair, they do get it right most of the time but their prints are all computer generated. There is no oversight. I at least look at my photos before I send them. I am looking for another company to do my prints. I’ve never had problems like this before

The presentation (book cover and folds) was good.  I liked setting up the pictures, they were initially placed in chronological order. When the book arrived, the cropping took out to many important parts of the pictures.

Review.Titre: I have been trying to contact someone…
Review.Contenu: I have been trying to contact someone at motif for a week now.  I sent an email and have called several time only to be disconnected each time.  The books I ordered and all the  black and white photos have a yellowish hue to them.   They are wedding photos taken by a professional photographer and they do not have a yellow cast to them.   I would love to get this resolved.  I am giving this book to my daughters mother in law and would like it to be perfect.  Thanks.

Review.Titre: The front cover came apart when I tried…
Review.Contenu: The front cover came apart when I tried to turn the page.

Review.Titre: Excellent product but more features needed to make preparing a book or calendar smoother and less subject to mistakes.
Review.Contenu: The product Motif turns out is excellent and they offer the largest sized calendars of any of the major suppliers.  However, the lack of an undo command means you can destroy hours of work with a simple mistake.  I understand they will unveil an undo feature (I think one that let's you go back as far as you want) soon and that will make this a much better product.  I wish also that you could swap all the pictures for one month for all the pictures of another month but that is not the case.  I have found their customer service very responsive.

Review.Titre: Latest Purchase Not Up to Par
Review.Contenu: I’ve been using Motif to make our big annual photo book for the past 6 years. I like the clean simplicity of the albums and I have always been impressed with the quality. Our 2021 album arrived last week, and I was kind of disappointed. Some of the colors on the cover did not print true, the spine appears stretched and creased (enough though the album is not any larger than albums from previous years), and the corners are a poorly glued and a bit frayed. The quality is just not up to par with previous albums.

The product was great, but I paid a lot for expedited shipping and it was never expedited - in other words, it showed up two or three days late. Normally a company would reimburse for something like this - I wrote to them explaining the issue and never received a reply. Too bad.

I gave 3 stars to my book because the final product turned out quite dark.  All the pictures are darker than the original and dampen the mood of many of the scenes.On the flip side, the software was easy to use—much more adjustable than the other 4 or 5 products out there.  I enjoyed making my photo book, just wish it was brighter!

Review.Titre: We had many issues creating our albums…
Review.Contenu: We had many issues creating our albums with Motif. Quality of Motif's albums  is not as we expected. Also working with their program, creating album can be frustrating. However, they have good customer service. They really try to help with all issues. Another good thing is quick shippment. Albums come really fast.

Review.Titre: A+, with a Fumble at the Finish Line!
Review.Contenu: I've had dozens of photo books and calendars made by your company – dating back to 2004 when they were white labeled as Apple Photo Books. I'm super impressed that over the years you've continuously upgraded your processes to produce higher and higher quality books. The same is true for the Motif app – it keeps getting better over time. Anyhow, my most recent book is a perfect example of high-quality materials and excellent printing quality. Sadly, the job fell short at the finish line – with the delivery. I selected the second fastest shipping option, but the book arrived well outside of that window – missing an important date (I'd planned to give this book as an anniversary gift to my wife).

Review.Titre: Pictures looked very clear when I had…
Review.Contenu: Pictures looked very clear when I had them online. Look blurry when I got the book. Maybe because the pages were not glossy??  Not sure. But a decent expletive. I would use them again

Review.Titre: I love the Motif calendars, but it could be better.
Review.Contenu: I love the Motif calendars - how you can put in your events on certain dates and pictures and the quality of the calendar. I would give it a 4 star if it wasn't so hard putting in events (the program dances around on my screen), and a 5 star if it kept the 300+ events on those dates from year to year so I didn't have to keep putting them in every year.

Review.Titre: A photobook company that is compatible with my mac photo  app
Review.Contenu: Having always used apple to create my books I was pleased to find another company which was similar . I was pleased with my first book - quality. The reason I didn’t give it 5* is that I found creating the book q difficult at times . I failed to add text to the cover as I initially wanted . However , I’ve just ordered my second book and am half way through creating my 3rd . Thank you

I order FIVE of the same book.  I love my photo book, but it turns out, I didn't like my book cover. I asked Motif if they could reprint the cover only. They said, "NO". But they were so generous (read with sarcasm) to offer to reprint all five books (that were perfect, except for the cover) at the same price I had paid. Not Impressed is their helpfulness.  Motif is a shop that does only one thing well.

3 stars because the end printed product is good and I like that. 3 stars because the software crashed probably 30+ times during the making of a single 50 page album and that was intensely frustrating. Motif - you continue to be plagued by software bugs - what is it that you can't sort out? My sense is that your virtual monopoly on those who used to use Apple Books has made you lazy. Harsh or fair?

Adding text is a major pain. Anytime you want to add text, it opens a box on the bottom of the page, resizing all the photos on the page. Then you can move the text box, but then you have to fix the pictures. If they would enable us to add the text box where we want it initially, we wouldn’t have to go back and fix the stuff it currently messes up.

Actually I’ve had real problems creating anything on motif recently. I don’t know 🤷‍♂️ what the issue is, but it crashes before I can finalise the project. It might be that my OS is old, or something wrong my end but I cannot really use it in the way I’d like to and of late not at all

Photo books are great, processing and shipping was fast. Would like to be able to indicate how many pages I would like to fill with photos, instead of all my photos automatically auto-flowed into way too many pages!

Review.Titre: great book, but a bit expensive
Review.Contenu: great book, however, it was a little too expensive, did a similar book in Germany with a different App, was a tad worse (although still very nice...) , but that one was less than half the price.....

Good options for calendar layouts, able to manipulate a template layout to suit my needs.  Wish I could put a picture into a box that is for a day that is not in the current month for the page.   I like to add more details in a month that I didn’t put in the layout and now I only can do that in boxes for tge current month.

Review.Titre: A beautiful calendar with a delay.
Review.Contenu: We have been ordering a beautiful calendar with our photos from Motif Photos for many years.  This year we did not get our calendar delivered to our home on the supposed date.  After a week we contacted the help service.  They knew exactly where we could pick up our calendar.

Usually Perfect pictures. Perfect cards.Only imperfection this year was that our cards were folded just 1/2mm away from the split between front and back pictures… such that we have a 1/2mm line above the front picture with the colors of the back picture… to be further improved next time!

Review.Titre: As a newbie to making books
Review.Contenu: As a newbie to making books, the site was not intuitive to me and I struggled to get the pictures into the album form and never did figure out how to add any comments.  In the end, I was mostly happy with the product and it arrived promptly

Review.Titre: Nice but should be simpler to do.....
Review.Contenu: I like to use Motif because of the interaction with Photos on my computer. I only make the calendar once a year. I don't feel as if the page layouts and photo placement is as easy as it once used to be. The process should be much simpler.

The automatic organization of the photos is great and saves a lot of effort.  However, I found it a little too difficult to shift photos around and to create new pages to fine tune the book. Also, several of the photos had sections cut off in the final book. (I don’t think they were like that when I was creating the book.). Also, text blocks were difficult to manipulate so one eventually gets tired of getting it just right, and you don’t. Having said that, I mostly loved the final product, especially the front and back covers and dust jacket flaps.
Eerything is beautiful, but the only thing is that I would like to order more books on the same order, so I could pay shipment only once.

A reasonably easy site to navigate with a good variety of page arrangements. I discovered how to customise it towards the end of my project. My calendar arrived today and it is bound well with good quality prints. My only suggestion would be on packaging. The calendar box has been squished in transit and the calender is a little bent. Maybe more robust packaging or a sticker that says 'Please do not bend' would stop this from happening.  All in all, I recommend Motif.

Review.Titre: Annual family photo calendar came out…
Review.Contenu: Annual family photo calendar came out very well.  Takes a while to assemble, but very good quality.  Would have rated a 5 *, but think a bit expensive.

Easy to select project type (in my case a 2024 calendar), edit copy, adjust how many photos I want to share per page. Easy checkout and fast shipping. I use the app which makes accessing photos easier. My only annoyance is downloading the photos and having to scroll through them even though I can filter by ‘unused’, etc.?

Review.Titre: Great product albeit with higher prices
Review.Contenu: Great product with easy to use website, only downside vs. the past is significant price increase after combining with Mimeo.

Review.Titre: The quality of the printed material is excellent.
Review.Contenu: The App itself is relatively easy to use, after one project it is a routine process to create another. If one creates something only annually, one should get familiar again with the processes before proceeding. The order and delivery process works well and the books, etc. arrive in protected packaging. I hope this app will be enhanced to add need new features. Quality excellent.

Review.Titre: Easy to use, but need portrait format book
Review.Contenu: It's an Easy to use program. I would have given a 5 star if there was a book in a portrait format. Because most of my pictures were taken in portrait, it was very difficult to fit the number of pictures in a landscape page.
Great quality, fab memories of a holiday Just wishing the cost of postage didn’t put me off using this site more often

Review.Titre: The books are beautiful but I ordered 3…
Review.Contenu: The books are beautiful but I ordered 3 and only received 2. I have contacted you several times. Initially you said I received them all but I didn’t. I think you are now preparing the 3rd but I’m not impressed with you  not knowing I’m missing one. I hope it comes

I might never have finished this project were it not for the excellent customer care I received from your team. They followed up and reached out until I got the kinks worked out. The only issue I’ve found is that the pages are wavy, as if affected by humidity. I’m hoping this works itself out now that it is in my home.
The Motif system is very easy to use. My only criticism is the limited size/format options.

Review.Titre: Nice easy program to create photo books!
Great App, but, please improve shipping
Review.Contenu: I have been making photo projects with Motif for a few years now. The template is easy to navigate. There have been some positive changes. I do find the shipping charges to be incredibly expensive. Parcel post used to be an option. Please bring back. Also I would like to be able to put more projects in one cart save shipping and packaging helps the earth.
Photos were very good.The focus problems were my fault.I wouldn't recomend UPS - they just leave a note and tell you to pick it up yourself saying you were not in. We were in all day!

Review.Titre: The delivery was faster than expected…
Review.Contenu: The delivery was faster than expected and the book is in great quality.

Photo book quite okay 😊But I miss the correct spelling when writing e.g. in French or Italian or German from a qwerty keyboard (like the è, é, ê, ä, etc) when using text boxes in a project. Unfortunately this affects the overall quality☹️
Brilliant calendar, very easy to make, fantastic quality and speedy delivery. A bit expensive but I’m very happy with it

I Would give joy 5 stars but shipping was way too expensive.  $6.00 the year before and now over $20.  Find a way to go back to $6 or I need to find a cheaper calendar.  I love everything else from the app, to how the calendar looks.  The shipping cost is a deal breaker!
The process of making a photo book was quick and easy. However, it would have been nice to have stickers and add-ons to personalize it and add more character to the pages.

It's the fifth time I use the product for birthday cards and have always enjoyed creating the cards, receiving and seeing the printed results ; this is the constructive part of my message.The less constructive part is that this time the card has been delivered in three steps by an unreliable shipping Cie. Mimeo needs to take care of that last part of the process and make sure this doesn't become the downside of a project.

Quality product. Loved by those who received it. Just wish there was a little more flexibility in design and layout. I used to use Aperture (application was discontinued) to make my photo books and could really do some designing.

Review.Titre: Pleased with the final product but…
Review.Contenu: Pleased with the final product but thought the cost of shipping was a bit steep!
The process is very simple which I appreciated on a short timeframe. However, the price is high and I will look for cheaper alternatives next time.
Beautiful execution of the calendar design, with accurate color rendition and nice resolution.  Fast and efficient production and delivery.  Only wish a few different sizes of calendars were offered.

Review.Titre: I think the photobook could have been…
Review.Contenu: I think the photobook could have been enhanced by being able to add a different layout of photos.Perhaps photos on an angle.

Review.Titre: It was really easy to import photos and…
Review.Contenu: It was really easy to import photos and work with them, moving them around.  I like the way you offer different page formats, with previews.I thought the auto-placement would place the photos chronologically, but it did not.  That would be a nice feature, if it can read the metadata/dates of the photos.Bottom line:  My mother-in-law loved her photo book!
Easy to use. Clear instructions. I like the alternative layout suggestions for each page.On the downside - quite expensive compared to other choices available on the market.

Review.Titre: Great design tool, hoping for softcover option to return
Review.Contenu: Love the Motif app for designing my photo books. Have made about 100 over the years. Lots of flexibility and ease of placement. I like to manually place and write my travel texts so highly personalized. My only complaint is that they stopped offering the 8.5" x 11" in softcover. It was available for many years and discontinued it since Jan 2023. Wish they would bring it back. PLEASE!!

Review.Titre: I choose Motif because I can create a…photo book from my iPad
Review.Contenu: I choose Motif because I can create a photo book from my iPad. That is great. But it is a pity that I cannot put a one line text underneath a photo, without shrinking the picture or changing the layout, because I can only choose from the text boxes that are given, which changes the layout that I had chosen.

Review.Titre: The album keep a high quality and the…
Review.Contenu: The album keep a high quality and the images is high quality if your photos are optimized. Maybe I wish some deeper black point, but if I know what I get, I can adjust it before publishing. If you want to create an album with a lot of text, it could be a good idea to get a layout more customized to that purpose. But this is really not a big deal.
A wonderful surprise when we got our album in the post. Good quality pictures and totally as expected. Appreciated the quick response to questions as well.

Review.Titre: Using Motif is the best way to creat a great foto album
Review.Contenu: I managed to creat a beautyful foto album because Motif has got a very good technology   to do this in the best way.And your help-line gave me advices to do something easyer.
Motif custom design for calendars is intuitive and easy to revise. I do not understand the algorithm used to determine that a photo is tagged as low quality.

Review.Titre: The end product turned out nicely
Review.Contenu: The end product turned out nicely. The process of creating the book was painful at times, though
The booklet is great.  Theonly thing that was wrong was my fault in not noticing I used the same picture twice.  Other than that, I love the booklet.

I love my projects, but the way they go together is always changing.  It is very hard to figure out how to manipulate the photos to where I want or to add wording.  There is so much more that I want to do, but don’t know how.

Review.Titre: Good options for size and layout
Review.Contenu: Good options for size and layout.  It is quite user-friendly providing access to photo options.  I've done 5 books now with different sizes and formats.  Terrific shipping time.
Photobook as usual executed to perfection! Only the extern removable cover was printed off center. A little failure but very visible among my 42 other books!

Review.Titre: I like the app because it’s easy to…
Review.Contenu: I like the app because it’s easy to move pictures and pages around to create the story you’re making with your book.  BUT… the pictures don’t have borders around them to make it look attractive and you can’t put text under individual pictures.  When Apple had their own book app, it was much better.

Review.Titre: Excellent product but appalling delivery service
Review.Contenu: Excellent product - hence the 4 star review. However, delivery experience was very poor. In spite of the expensive delivery charge, UPS dropped off the book at a collection centre 7 miles from my home rather than delivering to my address. Mimeo have not replied to my complaint. Customer Services need a huge improvement.

This was my 25 th photo book made and 12 th year. It is a fun but laborious creative outlet for me. I’ve used Motif most of this time since Apple photo books was discontinued. I love the product produced  by Motif. Perhaps Apple was a little better quality and gloss paper, I don’t remember. Overall, motif is a very easy software to use. I do have a wish list for suggested changes:  In addition to the color wheel, I wish there were a color chart option with multiple fixed colors, similar in size to e-card softwares. Choosing a custom color is tedious. I do appreciate that once chosen, they are saved.   I wish font could be personally chosen  and fixed ahead of the project.   I wish that text boxes could be placed after page is set up without changing the picture placement   I wish the thumbnail pix being used, shown under the book were bigger, could remain arranged in order of  my placement, and ‘used’ could be collected in another, separate file- not just checked  and in ‘all photos’.   Lastly, I wish there were stickers and decorations that could be added. Meanwhile, I’m very happy with the Motif photo book soft ware. I will continue to use it in future.

I’m an experienced user of Mimeo and Motif is similar in many ways. The book has vibrant colors, the photos are crisp and clean. I was disappointed that the text boxes are not as easy to move as on Mimeo. For instance, on Mimeo, I can choose a small text box to place on a photo, but this feature isn’t available on Motif. Otherwise, it’s a great system which helps me produce excellent photo books!

The photo albums, which I make with Motif are always of a high quality, so I do enjoy them very much. However the last one, made in July, I was charged a postal fee of Euro 30, almost half of the production costs. I now consider seriously to stop with their services.

I am not a technical person, so I had some difficulty using your product. I had trouble getting text on the correct pages to correspond to the pictures. My daughter (who is technically minded) helped me achieve the product I wanted. When I received our book, it was beautiful and so worth the effort. I do plan on using your product to organize my future holiday photos. Hopefully, I will be better at organizing the pictures and text.

Review.Titre: Hard Work yields a Good Outcome
Review.Contenu: There are several quirks that make creating the book difficult. For one, there should be a way to select the font you want and it will stay selected. There should be more flexibility in writing captions and in sizing the photos. Once you get through the process, the result is very satisfactory.

The quality of the printing and paper was excellent. Colors were pretty true. Sadly my first copy arrived damaged. Motif made it right by shipping me a new copy in better packaging that arrived in a timely manner.

Quite good result.. knowing that some of the pictures were old pictures that had been copied… so very nice result But unfortunately it was quite ruined because the shipping was so long.. without any explanation.. ! And it arrived much to late for a birthday present. And it was impossible to know before ordering how much delay it would take… so good result but much too late so very disappointing for that only reason…
Reliable, fast turn around. Photos are a little darker than on a computer screen so good to adjust for that.

Review.Titre: Putting material in is quite fiddly
Review.Contenu: Putting material in is quite fiddly; compiling a book is a long process. Result is good, but the whole process could be easier. More specifically, having chosen one style of book it would be nice to see the same layout in a different style without losing the original and/or having to enter all the material again.

Review.Titre: my first photobook with this company
Review.Contenu: my first photobook with this company. Quickly done, and it was good enough for my purpose. A bit on the expensive side, but there are not many fotobook software that allow movement of a single page, not just a double page - which is important in my creation process.

The editing tools available are not as robust as some other photo book vendors, but there were many page options open to me.  It was rather clunky, as I had to go back and resize my photo and then upload it again to properly resize.  The pages were flimsy compared to other photo books I have created.

Review.Titre: I find the experience of making a book…
Review.Contenu: I find the experience of making a book with Motif spotty. Uploading a group of photos from my Mac is easy and convenient. The photo templates are pretty good. I have trouble with the text boxes, getting them to stay in the place I put them. Plus I'll set up the font, size, boldness the way I want it and then it will change. It's unfortunate that you got rid of the 8.5 x 11" book as my art fit better in that format. The 8 x 8" was more difficult to format. That said, the books look good, the paper is nice.

I love my souvenir book. My issues were technical, and may have been due to my IPad.  Downloading pictures was complicated, four of us had a shared album, but I could not access it.  My sister was hoping to edit from her computer, but we could not figure out how to do that.  I loved that my original group of pics populated the format, it was easy to see the end result and make adjustments.  We labored over this project and it was satisfying to feel creative.  We are proud and pleased to have recorded our travels in a special way.  (This was our 2nd book, and a great improvement over our first one.)

Review.Titre: We created a photobook of a trip
Review.Contenu: We created a photobook of a trip.  Ease of using the app (we created in in iPhoto), 5/5.  Quality of printed materials, 5/5.  The only concern was that photos against the binding had a bit of an area that was lost in the binding.  For example, in one family photo, the person standing on the right has part of their face hidden in the binding.It would be nice to know the "safety" zone for photos as we place and zoom them so this doesn't happen!

I have used your publishing service several times the last few years.  Most of what I do is done with s cell phone photos sent by family, not my own more pro gear.  I, r therefore like the earrings given regarding resolution and size of photos.  Allows me to replace or reconsider placement.
End product was beautiful. Photo quality was great. Cost was higher than other similar products and discount coupons didn't work.

You did it BEST, but there are wishes for further comfort! The quality of the fotobook was excellent and I got the present rapidly, just in time for birthday present! Thank you so much! I had problems with adding further fotos to the working-album and I would like to have a tool to get the same format on the left and the right side. I did not save the last version of the fotobook on my handy!! Could better express my troubles in german, sorry for my poor English.

Review.Titre: Easier to use the layout process than…
Review.Contenu: Easier to use the layout process than in previous years. Wellprinted and presented ( in slip case)  price reasonable but the shock was the cost of postage ( almost the same as the 20 page hardback book )

Review.Titre: A great way to store treasured memories
Review.Contenu: The photo book is high quality which enhances the photographs. Service was excellent. The reason for the fours stars is I found it limited such as not being able to customize text colours to photos, and editing text boxes as they were hard to select. The effort was worth it, the book is perfect.

Review.Titre: Lovely Book bit fiddly at times
Review.Contenu: I do love my finished book but it did take me a lot of time. I think the most frustrating thing was having created lots of text boxes and writing in them. It all looks fine when you are creating the book but as soon as I went to get it printed there was an error message saying text was outside the boundary. So I then had to set to and change it all. I did have a couple of other problems but Motif team are brilliant at answering emails quickly to help.

Review.Titre: The quality of the calendar was good
Review.Contenu: The quality of the calendar was good, but the delivery service was not.The delivery was delayed, moreover, the deliveryman threw the box over the fence. If it had rained, our calendar would have been unusable.
Photo reproduction quality was great. Paper , end sheets, cover material were excellent. Still difficult to move text boxes. All photos on page need to be resized after moving a text box
My first try with making a photo book using Motif was a little confusing but future efforts were far easier. The final product each time has been excellent.

I love how the two books I ordered turned out. The quality of the printing is exceptional.  My pictures look even more amazing, than the real thing!  Yet, the computer program was a bit stubborn-- namely when it came to placing the pictures and the text.  I sense you have programming work to do to make this experience more friendly.  (versus tricky and frustrating)

Review.Titre: It is the results when receiving the…
Review.Contenu: It is the results when receiving the book that make it great. The only dislike with Motif is the interface when placing pictures. It is not easy to resize pictures. I crop pictures in Lightroom, but not to standard ratios, so when I bring them into Motif I may have to resize them. Not easy. I wish Motif had the same interface as the now defunct Apple Aperture. That interface was much easier to place picture.

Review.Titre: You want suggestions for improvement so…
Review.Contenu: You want suggestions for improvement so here goes!It all went well until I was finished! It's a real pain to have to put my name, billing address, AND Visa information on EACH individual calendar order. Why not arrange it so there's only one time I must put this information for ALL 5 of the calendars I ordered? This would speed up the process on my end and make it easier.

The calendar was easy to order. We like the product but I feel that the quality of the paper isn't as good as my prior calendars. I think the thickness is a bit thinner (compared to a company I used overseas). Overall, I would still order from you again.

Review.Titre: IPhoto's book creator was better, but no longer available.
Review.Contenu: I had trouble initially navigating and uploading additional photos. The page choices is also confusing and many of the configuration choices are not good (ie. the super think rectangles wouldn't work for anything!) Lastly, your pricing is quite high. IPhoto was easier and cheaper.

Generally it's very good and certainly the best I have found. It integrates reasonably well with Photos. My biggest issue with it is the payment system. It doesn't integrate with Apple's OS and always rejects my personal banking card - the only site to do this.

Review.Titre: no longer very big size album
Review.Contenu: The book I received was very well printed but I was a little bit disappointed that it was the biggest size.My others album were bigger and larger.And also, this time I wanted to have a "soft" cover and not a hard cover. Just a question : Is it still possible to have a bigger size ???

Great product, easy to use.  Very helpful photo editing and quality alerts enabling you get the best out of your photos.  Clear cost illustration as you progress.  A very reasonable turn around for the book's delivery.  The book is very well made and should last.A needed improvement is the choice of fixed photo page options.

Some weeks ago I wrote a damning Trustpilot review on Motif having received one album with a misprinted photo and then a second with half the pages blank. After trying to deal with the first line of customer service , an AI robot, I was extremely frustrated with the support I was given.Happily my review was picked up by Michele H, on the customer service team at Motif, who made direct contact. She proved to be outstanding; every response was immediate and helpful and she didn't give up until, after several days and many emails and interventions by her, I received five copies of the album. Each is now well printed and very faithfully reproduced. Entirely thanks to Michele I will use Motif again and my only advice, if you do have a genuine issue, is - Be patient , there is a real support team there and they will sort you out!
The work output looks beautiful. The delivery was timely. The software works well with Photos on my MacBook Pro.The only negative is the price. I'd print more books if they were cheaper.

Review.Titre: I liked the quality of the printing.
Review.Contenu: I liked the quality of the printed book. However while I was putting it together I had difficulty making correction to text. In fact using text at all was very hard. Being able to set my own styles for the whole book would help.

Seamless integration with apple photos but not quite as customisable as the old product retired by apple where you could do more with bindings and covers to personalise books for that extra special touch. Packaging and presentation were spot on just like apple fulfilled in the past.

It's very seamless to use Motif when working from an Apple Photo Library. It's a pleasure to be able to navigate back and forth from your project to your library, in order to further edit an image, or to add more photos to those already selected for the project (without having to deal with an outside web-based photo service where it's a 'production' each time you want to upload more images). Also, when I had one question about working on my project, I received prompt and thoughtful replies that were very helpful. The final product was wonderful, with excellent resolution and color in the photos.

Review.Titre: The process was easy and quality was…
Review.Contenu: The process was easy and quality was fine, but beware of how teeny-tiny these books are. I was so disappointed on the insignificance of what arrived. Pay more and get the larger size with hardcover.

Review.Titre: I was very happy with the photo book
Review.Contenu: I was very happy with the photo book.  It was reasonably easy to follow the process and make the book.  One thing I had an issue with was I could not figure out how to remove a placed picture without deleting it completely from the book.  I also could not figure out how to rotate a placed picture.  Other than that I was very happy.  Book arrived within a reasonable time and arrived in good condition.

The program was easy to use, results were good.  Even though some of the picture qualities were not up to your standards, they did turn out fine.  My only complaint would be that I would have liked options where the photos were not all lined up in rows.

I love the end result. The books are high quality paper, binding and photos. But using the app can be annoying and very slow. There’s still a lot of bugs to work out in the word boxes. The app freezes a lot. So you must check your work for mistakes. But the results are wonderful.

Review.Titre: Easy to use interface, good result.
Review.Contenu: Easy to use interface to make my calendar. The image editing function worked well and the final printed result was an accurate reflection of what was on the screen. Good colours.Compiling the calendar was more cumbersome and I would welcome greater flexibility to move image pages forwards and back through the months as, for a novice user, planning this in advance is difficult.Really pleased with the final result.

Customer Service was good. Software is still easy to use. I will probably use it again but to me its obvious that the quality of the prints went down over the years. I designed my sixth book now but have the feeling the standard went down a bit
The quality of printing!But I expected as before a promotion for the next book... the last books I didn't receive it since Mimeo photos make the prints...

Review.Titre: Quality of product is excellent.  Customer service not responsive.
Review.Contenu: I’m very happy with the quality of the book I created.  I took offa star because I could not get the coupon code I was provided to work and the two tickets I submitted were ignored.  Also, some of the features don’t work right on an IPad (such as squeezing a photo to shrink the image).  Also, it would be nice if I could include multiple projects in the same order.
Very pleased with the photo book commemorating a charity walk. App was pretty easy to use and the finished product is great quality. Good communications from the company on order progress .

I have put together many books in Motif and very pleased with the quality of the results. My last big project was a family cookbook. It has taken many hours of tedious work to type in the recipes, stories, and cut lines.  The table of contents with all the spacing was a real bear!!  At times the times the text software was on its knees, so slow it would take forever to type in one word.  I re-booted my computer many times to get through the text box. I might add that my Mac Pro is very powerful and runs the latest operating software.It is great for picture books but can hardly handle large volumes of text. The book turned out great--lots of work!!

The 2 photo books are awesome. The speed from ordering to delivery was amazing…less than a week. The second book was four days from placing the order to deliveryI found the program itself was quite frustrating. It is difficult to work with the layout format. Mainly with trying to change the parameters of an image within a box. The yellow handles are so frustrating to work with.Another photo program I use is much more user friendly. I will use motif again because of delivery speed but I will use the rival program for its ease of use. My wish would be a program that is as easy to use as powerpoint is.Customer service was fantastic. It was a quick response and very helpful.Note: I did two orders: Oct 30/22 and Nov 7/22.

Great printing service. Well integrated with the Photos app for macOS.Some room for improvement in the composition phase (deleting photos, highlighting photos added from the library to the project).I had a delay in delivery but nothing serious.

Everything was ok, even if former iPhoto album feature was easier to use in my opinion.One of the features I mostly miss with Motif if the ability to have a single photo printed (ie. a pano) on a double-page.

Review.Titre: It's a great photo book that looks very…
Review.Contenu: It's a great photo book that looks very professional. When creating the photo book, it would be great if you had justification available.

Review.Titre: The clarity of the pictures and the…
Review.Contenu: The clarity of the pictures and the colors were great.  When making the book some of the text boxes became a little hard to move or resize and I wasn't quite sure on how the margins of the pictures would be in the layout. All in all I was pleased with the end product.  I will be a little better informed with the next one.

Review.Titre: While I miss the old version of Apple…
Review.Contenu: While I miss the old version of Apple photos where I could create a book directly in the app, this is a good alternative. Easy to use and had what I needed at a reasonable price. Shipping was quick as well.

Review.Titre: I made a calendar. Easy to construct - excellent result
Review.Contenu: I make a family calendar every year based on Apple Photos. Since Apple stopped providing a printing service I've been using Motif, and I am very happy with the result in terms of quality and ease of production. The software does pretty much everything I need it to do, and the uploading and subsequent delivery is really quick and easy. I hope to continue using Motif for the foreseeable future.

The app could be a bit better with some bug fixes but overall is was simple, user friendly, great designs and just fun to work on.I was nervous about the quality of the pictures in the printed album because they were mostly taken on an iPhone but OMG they are stunning. Would 100% recommend using motif and I will definitely use it again for future albums.

I have used Motif for several years to create calendars for the next year and have found everything from start to delivery to be excellent. Placing multiple pictures on each month's page and rearranging them is easy. I have also created books from travel memories and have been very pleased with them as well.

Thank you, Motif!  My original order for my Photo Book strangely had a production flaw in it.  One message to Motif and they quickly and clearly communicated their apology and desire to correct the problem.  The result within a few days was the shipment of a replacement Photo Book that was in perfect condition at no additional cost.  Quality and Service were superior!  Thank you, Motif.

Review.Titre: Very happy with my photo book
Review.Contenu: Really happy with the soft cover landscape book I had made. Good quality printing, the photos turned out well, nicely bound. However I thought the postage was excessive for the small book it was. Would like to see the postage pricing scaled according to the size of the parcel.

I enjoyed making a 4 x 6" season's greetings card to send to my friends.  It was easy in Apple Photos and then using the Motif project with flexible templates.  The order arrived in a nice neat package several days before the estimated arrival, allowing me to get them to the post office in time.

My photo book is perfect!  The most difficult task for me was logging into your new mimeophoto apt...because the Motif app would not "let me in,"...your rep wa VERY PATIENT and spent several hours guiding me in setting up a new passwords. Now I'm all set!! THANKS!
The calendar turned out great. Furthermore, when UPS delivered the package to the wrong address, MOTIF redid the order and had it delivered correctly by FED-EX. Thank you!!

Our yearly family calendar turned out great.  We received the calendars within a week of ordering.  Each of our kids gets one & they love seeing who made the cover photo each year.  This is a great way to preserve family memories and list all family members’ birthdays & anniversaries.
the site is easy to navigate and create in.  Improved over last year. I love sending the calendars as they are so appreciated.

Review.Titre: Best self produced photo book ever
Review.Contenu: I custom added photos to a theme provided by Motif.  The book came and was better than I had envisioned.  It was so simple to create while also being fun.  Can’t wait to share them with my family.  I bought 3 copies.
Motif/Mimeo reprinted my book for free because the initial copy had some defects. So, great customer service and great quality product.

Review.Titre: Simple to use and outstanding product
Review.Contenu: Very simple to use and the results are amazing. Very happy with the finished product and looks very professional. Will be giving the hardback book as a present and I know the recipient will be as delighted as I was. Thoroughly recommended.

Review.Titre: This was my 13th year to make a family…
Review.Contenu: This was my 13th year to make a family book for Christmas gifts. My family loves them...It has gotten so much easier over the years. I do wish there were more layout options. Mimeo did a good job with the picture quality. I did order the wrong book,(I like the original one) but customer service was very helpful in changing it and also with my refund.Thanks

Review.Titre: Great Calendar - admired by all the family
Review.Contenu: I make a calendar for my mother every year (she’s now 94), with photos of the past year contributed by all her children, grandchildren and great grandchildren - a present she looks forward to with great expectation!This years is, as ever of great quality and I look forward to giving it to her on Christmas Day.
Great online creation site. The experience was very good, and the product was delivered in very short order.
Great integration with Apple Photos app.  Really easy to set up a template and plenty of options available.
Came out better than I expected and the photos they said were low on light came out perfect. I’ll buy again.
The process of putting together my calendar was very easy and quick. I really like the layout of the app.
Quick turnaround in order.  Beautiful book - all pictures had great finish this year 😊🙏🏼

Review.Titre: Motif was very easy to use
Review.Contenu: Motif was very easy to use. I created my book on a MacBook Air and it was very intuitive. The book came and the quality rivals the old Apple photo books. I’m very pleased.
I love the quick service. Especially nice around the Holidays. Calendars are made with sturdy stock and look professional.

I've used Motif for years. The quality is excellent and the lead times are very good. I had a problem with the website ordering recently where a discount was not applied, and having supplied proof of the issue, they resolved it within a matter of hours. Superb.
Easy to use and easy to upload pictures. Different formats, for each page allows flexibility.
I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the photos which were very old and exposure not very good.  We have a lovely memory book of my husband's childhood pictures.

Review.Titre: Everything came out exactly right and I…
Review.Contenu: Everything came out exactly right and I plan to use Motif again next year to create another calendar!

Review.Titre: The quality of these photo books are…
Review.Contenu: The quality of these photo books are excellent. The software is easy to use and the delivery is fast.I do wish they weren’t so expensive though. It’s hard to justify paying so much.

Review.Titre: I made ten calendars and have done this…
Review.Contenu: I made ten calendars and have done this for many years. This is the third company through Apple. I needed someone to help me get started but, once I completed the first one, I was fine on my own

Review.Titre: The quality of Motif finished product is really excellent.
Review.Contenu: I compiled 2 different calendars and a photobook.  They are all fantastic as usual.  I have used Motif for a few years.  The quality of the finished product is excellent. I sometimes use just one picture on some months of my calendar, the quality of the enlarged product is so good I sometimes have them framed.
I've been ordering a calendar from my mom from Motif for 6 years. They are definitely the best and worth the price. She LOVES them. Highly recommend.
Beautiful quality as always and excellent customer service.It is just a shame that postage is now so expensive.
Great quality, beautiful colors. So much better than the last company I used for photo books. Will be using Motif again!
Very intuitive, easy to use software. So easy to change layouts, color scheme etc so you end up with a masterpiece when finished!

Review.Titre: very flexible yet easy to use program
Review.Contenu: very flexible yet easy to use program. Product of excellent quality with fast turnaround.
I have been making a similar calendar for years now and motif has always produced a good quality product from my photos. Easy to use program and delivery turns around quickly. Very pleased.

Review.Titre: The website was easy to use
Review.Contenu: The website was easy to use and the quality of the book is very high.  Shipping seems expensive especially the expedited charges.  Shipping is also pretty slow.

Review.Titre: Although I have been away from Motif…
Review.Contenu: Although I have been away from Motif for a couple of years, it was easy to jump back in and the outcome was a wonderful recording of life itself.  THANKS!😊
After a few initial hiccups getting the App to work the final product was excellent. The speed of the service was tremendous

Review.Titre: The quality of the product -- a photo…
Review.Contenu: The quality of the product -- a photo book--is excellent.Delivery in a week appreciated.

My latest purchase experience with Motif was not up to previous, very high-quality ones. After reporting the problems I faced, I was contacted by Michele, who immediately showed both understanding and willingness to solve and save the situation. Michele demonstrated commitment to excellent customer service and convinced me about the Motif's true customer oriented approach.I'm therefore glad to continue as a satisfied Motif user and thankful of the time and effort she took solving my case.

Review.Titre: I make a motif calendar every year for…
Review.Contenu: I make a motif calendar every year for my family and it has become a mandatory gift now, so thank you for your severe easy to use application and quality printing:)

Review.Titre: Motif is easy to use with apple photos
Review.Contenu: Motif is easy to use with apple photos. The quality of the book and photos is awesome, complete with paper dust jacket! This is my 4th major project and I’ll surely be doing another.

Review.Titre: I love the book I made!
Review.Contenu: I love the book I made about my friend's cat that I'm giving her for Christmas. It turned out just perfect!
Ez to do, can have app select layout with auto fill of your pics, and then revise as needed, or do it all yourself.

Review.Titre: A good product at a reasonable price…
Review.Contenu: A good product at a reasonable price with exceptionally fast turn round, thank you.

Motif is, at least for me, the best software for creating photobooks.The only thing that's been bothering me lately is the shiny dust jacket on the book. It was much better in matte. But all in all an excellent product.

Review.Titre: Brilliant app and system for making…
Review.Contenu: Brilliant app and system for making that perfect photo album. So easy to use and a great online live chat service too - who were happy to hear of any ideas you have too!

Review.Titre: I love that with each calendar page I…
Review.Contenu: I love that with each calendar page I can choose the number of pictures I want and the layout. The calendars are high quality.

Review.Titre: The ability to add frames is great and…
Review.Contenu: The ability to add frames is great and the quality of paper used is excellent

Review.Titre: This integrated process is so much better!
Review.Contenu: OMG, I've created photo books before and the interface with Apple Photos makes the process so much easier!  The app integrates beautifully with Photos so instead of uploading tons of photos, you work within your photo app - then upload the finished product.  Once I got the hang of page layout (not long), the process couldn't have been easier.  And the end result is really good and a good value.

Review.Titre: Great quality book, quick production and delivery!
Review.Contenu: The book was printed and delivered in mere days from the moment I hit the "send" button and the quality of the paper and printing was excellent. My only critique is that I wish I had a few more design controls in creating the book (such as putting strokes/frames around images, overlapping images and adjusting the picture and type page insets), but am still giving 5 stars, understanding that some of these omissions is to make the books as foolproof as possible to create for people without print design experience. Hopefully they can continue to add new features as the program evolves. There were a few odd things, but I soon found workarounds for them (example: style a sample text box and then copy and paste that text into other text boxes you create. Saves a lot of time styling. Being able to just copy and paste the entire text box would be better still).

Review.Titre: Very versatile and user friendly app
Review.Contenu: Very versatile and user friendly app, excellent printing, combined with prompt and efficient delivery service.
The page templates are easy to work with. Should your picture not reproduce well, you are notified during assembly. Good experience.

While it took me a little time to figure out how to arrange the pictures, the process was really simple and the photo books are gorgeous!  I did 8 separate projects adding up to 43 books!  Fairly expensive (for me, that is), but the look on my family’s faces will be worth it!  Oh, and the communication about the process was excellent!!  I’ll definitely be using Motif again!!  Thank you so much!!!
Motif was very easy to work with everything flowed very easily - no stress!!!  Arrived in 4 days after ordering and all was perfect.

Review.Titre: Every photo book was a joy
Review.Contenu: Have ordered multiple books over the last years, every single one of them had great quality and fast shipping.
Easy to use and a wonderful way to capture memories

Review.Titre: The Christmas card looked exactly like how it looked on my Mac.
Review.Contenu: The Christmas card looked exactly like how it looked on my Mac. The colors and writing were perfect! Thanks!

Review.Titre: Excellent quality for photo book you…
Review.Contenu: Excellent quality for photo book you want for a lifetime! Highly recommend… easy to use and create.
