Service was FAST.Quality was EXCELLENT!Online setup and creation was easy to follow with instructions given, and I could not have been happier with the results.  I will continue to create photo books with your company! 👍

All my calendars were wonderful way of saving memories year on year. All my calendars have been saved by family members across the world. Your books made up of my own memories of 20 years of creating.

Review.Titre: The website is simple to use with a…
Review.Contenu: The website is simple to use with a comprehensive choice of page layouts. The whole process of ordering and monitoring the delivery of the finished product was easy and the final product was excellent.
Superb quality, however the price has gone up significantly, can only justify it when using a savings code

I found the website easy & understandable. Simple and straightforward directions helped me assemble my memory book in short order. I enjoyed knowing my project was saved and I could come back to it anytime I had time. The book I received arrived quickly and without any damage-it was securely and completely protected. I will continue using Motif for my projects.

Review.Titre: What really set my experience apart was the proactive customer service
Review.Contenu: The order of 56 photo calendars was processed promptly and was of excellent quality.  But what really set my experience apart was the proactive customer service: they noticed I'd inadvertently uploaded 2023 instead of 2024 calendars, and contacted me to see if that was what I really wanted. They then helped me replace the order with corrected calendars.

Review.Titre: Fast and easy professional quality books
Review.Contenu: So easy to use and templates are flexible so I can edit! I created two books as gifts in less than two weeks!

Review.Titre: The photo book came out better than…
Review.Contenu: The photo book came out better than expected! We are pleased with the final product although the computer program alerted that some photos had low resolutions.
Easy to use and manage the Book Development.  Delivery was as Promised and arrived is secure packaging.  I plan to use this service over and over again
Easy to upload my photos and the finished product was great. Have done 2 now to remember my holidays.

Review.Titre: Unlike last year when the order was…
Review.Contenu: Unlike last year when the order was incorrect 3 times, this year everything was perfect and it came in a timely manner. Whew. PERFECT!

Review.Titre: I've made several photo books using…
Review.Contenu: I've made several photo books using Motif, mostly of family vacations.  All the books have turned out beautiful with clear pictures and great color.  Lots of options to arrange pictures and add extra touches. I've just finished another travel photo book and plan on making more in the future.

Review.Titre: Motif Photo Books For Passing On Family History
Review.Contenu: The book turned out great as was the book I produced a year ago.  I use them for family history books, which are designed mainly for our grandchildren.  I also do a related textual history book.  It may be my lack of understanding how the software works, but I would prefer to be able to put more text into the photo book.  Also having more options of photo layouts would be helpful, though I realize that by resizing the places for the photos you could pretty much change them however you want.
Perfect quality and fast delivery! Just great

Reliable and fast, and eventually a really nice outcome of my photobook project! Seamless project within the Apple Photos ecosystem from project startup inside the photos app all the way to ordering and payment also within the Apple Photos program. I gladly recommend Motif/Mimeo as Your Photographic partner if it is a book, calendar, canvas or other photo related stuff!

I created a wedding album for my niece and family on my apple mac and found the whole process seamless. It was very easy to design and place my photos. The instructions are extremely helpful too. There was a good choice of cover designs, and it was very easy to change page layouts. When the albums arrived I was blown away by the professional look, feel and weight of it. Even the gold colour looks gold, which doesn't happen very often. They arrived very well packaged too and each album has a protective sleeve. Would highly recommend using Motif and I look forward to creating another project this way.
Second time I’ve ordered books and once again they were absolutely amazing. Turnaround time was great.  Arrived within 5 days of ordering. Highly recommend.

Unmatched paper and print quality! The size is perfect and really features the images beautifully... I give calendars every year as gifts and now everyone looks forward to getting them and keeping them forever!
Very easy to create my calendar project and delivery was exceptionally quick. Great quality product.
Quick shipping, easy to use app, cute product

Review.Titre: Very easy editing process with Motif
Review.Contenu: Very easy editing process with Motif - the book went together so quickly.  Love the low res photo warning.Great packaging.  Quick turnaround.  Will do another book soon!

Review.Titre: The choices I was given and then the…
Review.Contenu: The choices I was given and then the quality of the product as excellent. Thank you.

Review.Titre: Still waiting after almost 3 weeks for…
Review.Contenu: Still waiting after almost 3 weeks for it to be delivered.The problem was with the delivery and not Motif. UPS never delivered the parcel and sent it back to Motif. Michelle was most helpful the parcel arrived on Thursday by a different courier and the item is awesome 🤩 can’t wait to show the recipients.Many thanks to Michelle.

Review.Titre: I like the fact that most all the tools…
Review.Contenu: I like the fact that most all the tools are easy to use. And I can go back and forth between the book tools and IPhoto to get the look that I want. It would be nice if the text box tool lower line could move down the page about another 1/4 inch.
The variety of options for my projects was totally supported my Motif. In addition the support staff was always ready and available for feedback, guidance, and assistance.

Review.Titre: The photo book I recently made and…
Review.Contenu: The photo book I recently made and ordered is exactly as expected! I am thankful for the service that enables me to create my projects with ease!
I order 20 calendars and everyone absolutely loves them!

Review.Titre: I found your online system very user…
Review.Contenu: I found your online system very user friendly . Very easy to operate the system. I received my photo book , and I was thrilled with the outcome. It was beautiful. Thank you !

Beautiful photo book. Very easy to set up on my MacBook and extremely compatible. Reminded me of when Apple had their own photo book package. Didn’t take me long to work out what to do. Very pleased. I will be ordering more

Review.Titre: I love working with Motiff it’s easy to…
Review.Contenu: I love working with Motiff it’s easy to make changes to page layouts, # of images on a page.  It is a very user friendly program.  The finished product always looks so professional!

I am so pleased with the two photo books I just ordered. I love how easy it was to use my MacBook to create the books. I chose the option where the photos are placed- there were very few edits I needed to make before ordering. Thankful I found a coupon code to help bring the price down a bit. Will definitely order again!!

Review.Titre: Delighted as a First Time User
Review.Contenu: As a first time user of this App, I thought it was very straightforward to use. I like the features to add information to dates. I also liked that I could even include an image on the back cover. This will certainly not be my last order.
Process is easy to use. Quality is good. Product was delivered on time.

Review.Titre: I was very pleased with my card
Review.Contenu: I was very pleased with my card.  Your products always come through so beautifully.  I had some frustration with trying to write text over my image.  And I had a lot of trouble just ordering the card.  Once I realized that I had to get signed in to mimeo to order a card on motif, then it finally worked.  I do appreciate theft, that you answer emails so quickly.  I will rely on that help in the future.  It used toktake a day or so for you to answer, but it seems you haveimprfbed that customer service, and that will make it a lot easier for me when I made my calendars.

Review.Titre: My daughter put my book together for me…
Review.Contenu: My daughter put my book together for me as I’m a bit of a dinosaur when it comes to things like that, but the finished product was beautiful!

The book was created as a condolence gift for the loss of a family pet. I cannot stress how simple it was to create (even for a senior who is not particularly tech savvy) and the result was absolutely gorgeous. The cost was very reasonable and the book arrived in record time. Great quality too. So happy with the result!
Fairly priced (with discount). Delivery was incredibly efficient.  Thanks Motif team!!

The first book had some fault, some pictures has not been uploaded, I wrote in the evening, the answer came same evening, with regrets, I was asked to upload the book again, and I got a new book 5 days later, that is good customer service.Thank you very much, the next book will be placed on Motif again.
Easy to use, used several times.
